messages.content:
જો તમારું "Nero" ડિવાઇસ અપડેટ થયેલું નથી, તો તમે નીચેના પગલાંઓનું પાલન કરી શકો છો:

1. **ડિવાઇસને ચકાસો**: ખાતરી કરો કે ડિવાઇસ એપ્લિકેશન સાથે જોડાયેલું છે.
2. **નેટવર્ક કનેક્ટિવિટી**: ઇન્ટરનેટ કનેક્શન ચકાસો.
3. **બેટરી સ્થિતિ**: બેટરીની સ્થિતિ તપાસો, જો બેટરી ઓછી હોય તો તેને ચાર્જ કરો.
4. **ડિવાઇસને પુનઃપ્રારંભ કરો**: ડિવાઇસને ફરીથી શરૂ કરો.

જો આ પગલાંઓ પછી પણ સમસ્યા યથાવત રહે, તો વધુ મદદ માટે સંપર્ક કરો.
messages.en:
If your "Nero" device is not updated, you can follow the following steps:

1. **Check device**: Make sure the device is connected to the app.
2. **Network connectivity**: Check internet connection.
3. **Battery Status**: Check the state of the battery, charge it if the battery is low.
4. **Restart device**: Restart device.

If the problem persists even after these steps, contact for more help.

messages.content:
सेंसरची वायर कापली गेली होती आणि त्यानंतर तो एक दिवस चालू होता, परंतु आता बंद आहे, याचा अर्थ वायर किंवा कनेक्टरमध्ये काही समस्या असू शकते. 

कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:
1. वायर किंवा कनेक्टरमध्ये कोणतीही भेग किंवा तुटलेली जागा आहे का?
2. सेंसरची स्थिती योग्य आहे का? म्हणजे तो मातीमध्ये व्यवस्थित आहे का?

जर तुम्हाला याबद्दल शंका असेल किंवा तुम्हाला तांत्रिक सहाय्याची आवश्यकता असेल, तर तुम्ही एक सपोर्ट तिकीट तयार करू इच्छिता का?
messages.en:
The wire of the sensor was cut and then it was on for a day, but is now closed, which means there may be some problem with the wire or connector. 

Please check the following:
1. Is there any crack or broken space in the wire or connector?
2. Is the position of the sensor correct? I mean, is it okay in the soil?

If you have doubts about this or need technical assistance, would you like to create a support ticket?

messages.standalone_en: Why are updates not coming for Fyllo?

faq:
Q: How I check my Fyllo app version? Or how do I know my Fyllo app is updated or not?
A: In Fyllo app go to hamburger menu (click on “≡” three lines).
   Then scroll down, you will see Fyllo logo and app version under it.

Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

Q: How do I contact customer support for Fyllo?
A: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in. Do you want me to raise a support ticket for you?

Q: How can I trust that Fyllo's fertigation schedule is accurate?
A: Fyllo's fertigation schedule is scientifically developed and validated based on crop requirements. It takes into account factors such as crop variety, growth stage, soil conditions, and available nutrient data from soil, leaf, or petiole tests when available.

Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.
 - Agronomical Algorithms created by a team of scientists led by Dr. Shikhamany, who is considered by many as the father of Indian grape industry.
 - 100% customer retention: Fyllo is known for its service on the ground, 24-hour issue resolution.
 - User-friendly interface that's easy to understand for all language and age group users.

messages.content: પાણી નું સેન્સર ખરા છે
messages.en: The water sensor is true
messages.standalone_question: Is the water sensor working properly?
messages.standalone_en: Is the water sensor working properly?

faq:
Q: How do I know if my soil  moisture sensor is working fine ?
A: The only way to know is if after irrigation the sensor is dropping below 5 kpa and increasing continuously unless next irrigation is done. You can try putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. Also, a soil moisture reading of 0 kPa is perfectly fine, meaning wet soil, but a reading of 200 kPa could mean fault. If the soil moisture sensor reading is consistently at 0 from few 48 hours, then it could be anamolous (use live and historical hourly soil moisture data (use tool) to validate).

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is showing dry.
A: Ask user when he irrigated. It usually takes 12 hours to reach the water till sensor. If the sensor is not dropping even after 12 hours, it can be due to one of the following reasons :
Water is not reaching properly till the sensor , this can be due to drip blocked , or slope in the land or dripper outlets far away from the sensor. Ask user to check if drip is fine and  dripper is within the range of sensor. 
The sensor can be very old , more than two years , in this case , the sensor might be malfunction, ask user if he wants to raise a ticket

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

messages.content:
જો તમે પાણીના સેન્સર વિશે પૂછતા હો, તો તે યોગ્ય રીતે કાર્ય કરી રહ્યું છે કે કેમ તે તપાસવા માટે, તમે નીચેના મુદ્દાઓને ધ્યાનમાં રાખી શકો છો:

1. **સેન્સર રીડિંગ**: જો સેન્સર 0 થી 5 kPa વચ્ચે છે, તો તે ભેજ દર્શાવે છે. 0 kPa એટલે જમીન ભેજ છે, જે સામાન્ય છે. જો તે 200 kPa છે, તો તે સૂકી જમીન દર્શાવે છે.

2. **જમીનની સ્થિતિ**: સેન્સર દ્વારા માપવામાં આવેલી ભેજ જમીનના મૂળ વિસ્તારમાં છે, જે ઉપરથી દેખાતી જમીનથી અલગ હોઈ શકે છે. 

3. **જમીન ખોદવું**: સેન્સરની આસપાસ જમીન ખોદીને ભેજ તપાસો. જો તે ભેજ છે, તો સેન્સર યોગ્ય રીતે કાર્ય કરી રહ્યું છે.

4. **ઇરિગેશન પછી**: જો તમે ઇરિગેશન કર્યા પછી 0 થી 5 kPa સુધીની રીડિંગ જોઈ રહ્યા છો, તો તે યોગ્ય છે.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો!
messages.en:
If you ask about a water sensor, to check if it's working properly, you can keep the following points in mind:

1. **Sensor Reading**: If the sensor is between 0 and 5 kPa, it shows moisture. 0 kPa means soil moisture, which is normal. If it is 200 kPa, it shows dry land.

2. **Ground condition**: The moisture measured by the sensor is in the original area of the soil, which may be different from the soil seen from above. 

3. **Digging the ground**: Check the moisture by digging the ground around the sensor. If it's moisture, the sensor is working properly.

4. **After irrigation**: If you are looking at a reading from 0 to 5 kPa after doing the irrigation, it is correct.

If you would like more information, please let me know!

messages.content: ખરાબ થય ગએલ છે
messages.en: It's gone bad
messages.standalone_question: Is the sensor malfunctioning?
messages.standalone_en: Is the sensor malfunctioning?

messages.content:
જો તમારા સેન્સર 200 kPa બતાવી રહ્યો છે, તો તે સૂચવે છે કે જમીન સંપૂર્ણ રીતે સૂકી છે અથવા સેન્સર જમીનથી બહાર છે અથવા સેન્સર સુધી વીજળી પહોંચતી નથી. 

કૃપા કરીને નીચેના મુદ્દાઓ તપાસો:

1. **સેન્સરનું સ્થાન**: ખાતરી કરો કે સેન્સર જમીનમાં યોગ્ય રીતે સ્થાપિત છે અને જમીનથી બહાર નથી.

2. **વાયર અને કનેક્ટર્સ**: ચકાસો કે સેન્સર માટેના વાયર કાપેલા નથી અને કનેક્ટર્સ યોગ્ય રીતે જોડાયેલા છે.

3. **જમીનનું ભેજ**: જો તમે લાંબા સમયથી પાણી આપ્યું નથી, તો 200 kPa વાંચન સામાન્ય છે. 

જો તમે પાણી આપ્યા પછી પણ સેન્સર 200 kPa બતાવે છે, તો કૃપા કરીને મને જણાવો, હું વધુ મદદ કરી શકું છું.
messages.en:
If your sensor is showing 200 kPa, it indicates that the ground is completely dry or the sensor is off the ground or the electricity does not reach the sensor. 

Please check out the following points:

1. **Location of sensor**: Make sure the sensor is properly installed in the ground and not off the ground.

2. **Wires and Connectors**: Check that the wires for the sensor are not cut and that the connectors are connected properly.

3. **Soil moisture**: If you haven't watered for a long time, a 200 kPa reading is normal. 

If the sensor shows 200 kPa even after you've watered, please let me know, I can help with more.

આધાર પર, તમારા પ્લોટ માટે ગણતરી કરેલ સિંચાઈના કલાકો 1.91 કલાક છે.

હું આ ગણતરી માટે નીચેના સેટિંગ્સનો ઉપયોગ કર્યો:
- રુટ પહોળાઈ: 24 ઇંચ
- રુટ ઊંડાઈ: 12 ઇંચ
- મીઠા ધરતીની જાળવણી: 150 મીમી
- ડ્રિપર અંતર: 1.3 મીમી
- ડ્રિપર ડિસ્ચાર્જ: 2 લિટર

શું તમે અલગ સેટિંગ્સ સાથે સિંચાઈના કલાકો ગણવા માંગો છો? જો હા, તો કૃપા કરીને નવા મૂલ્યો આપો.

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

messages.content:
આપના પ્લોટ માટે ખાતરનો વર્તમાન અને આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ નીચે આપેલ છે:

### Om Farm (પ્લોટ 1)
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** મધ્ય તબક્કાનો ફળ વિકાસ (1મો સપ્તાહ)
  - **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ:** 
    - **ખાતર:** મોનો પોટેશિયમ ફોસ્ફેટ
    - **માત્રા:** 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **નોટ:** ફોલિયર સ્પ્રેમાં માઇક્રો-ન્યુટ્રિયન્ટ ખાતરનો સંકેત 1% થી વધુ ન હોવો જોઈએ (ઉદાહરણ: 5 કિલોગ્રામ 500 લિટર પાણીમાં).
  
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ:**
    - **વિકલ્પ 1:** 
      - પોટેશિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ: 4 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
      - યુરિયા: 1 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **વિકલ્પ 2:**
      - યુરિયા: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
      - સલ્ફેટ ઓફ પોટાશ: 3.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

- **આગામી તબક્કો:** મોડા તબક્કાનો ફળ વિકાસ અને કાપ

### Rudra Farm (પ્લોટ 2)
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** મધ્ય તબક્કાનો ફળ વિકાસ (1મો સપ્તાહ)
  - **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ:** 
    - **ખાતર:** મોનો પોટેશિયમ ફોસ્ફેટ
    - **માત્રા:** 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **નોટ:** ફોલિયર સ્પ્રેમાં માઇક્રો-ન્યુટ્રિયન્ટ ખાતરનો સંકેત 1% થી વધુ ન હોવો જોઈએ (ઉદાહરણ: 5 કિલોગ્રામ 500 લિટર પાણીમાં).
  
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ:**
    - **વિકલ્પ 1:** 
      - પોટેશિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ: 4 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
      - યુરિયા: 1 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - **વિકલ્પ 2:**
      - યુરિયા: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
      - સલ્ફેટ ઓફ પોટાશ: 3.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

- **આગામી તબક્કો:** મોડા તબક્કાનો ફળ વિકાસ અને કાપ

જો તમને વધુ માહિતીની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો!
messages.en:
The current and upcoming fertigation schedule of fertilizer for your plot is given below:

### Om Farm (Plot 1)
* **Current phase:** Mid-stage fruit development (1st week)
  - **Foliar method:** 
    - **Fertilizer:** Mono potassium phosphate
    * **Quantity:** 3 kg/acre
    * *Note:** The indication of micro-nutrient fertilizer in foliar spray should not be more than 1% (e.g.: 5 kg in 500 liters of water).
  
* **Fertigation method:**
    - **Option 1:** 
      Potassium nitrate: 4 kg/acre
      Urea: 1 kg/acre
    - **Option 2:**
      Urea: 2 kg/acre
      Sulphate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre

* **Next stage:** Late stage fruit growth and harvest

### Rudra Farm (Plot 2)
* **Current phase:** Mid-stage fruit development (1st week)
  - **Foliar method:** 
    - **Fertilizer:** Mono potassium phosphate
    * **Quantity:** 3 kg/acre
    * *Note:** The indication of micro-nutrient fertilizer in foliar spray should not be more than 1% (e.g.: 5 kg in 500 liters of water).
  
* **Fertigation method:**
    - **Option 1:** 
      Potassium nitrate: 4 kg/acre
      Urea: 1 kg/acre
    - **Option 2:**
      Urea: 2 kg/acre
      Sulphate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre

* **Next stage:** Late stage fruit growth and harvest

If you need more information, please let me know!

messages.content:
જો એપ્લિકેશનમાં કોઈ એરર આવી રહ્યો છે, તો તમે નીચેના પગલાં અજમાવી શકો છો:

1. **ડિવાઇસને ચકાસો**: ખાતરી કરો કે ડિવાઇસ એપ્લિકેશન સાથે જોડાયેલું છે.
2. **નેટવર્ક કનેક્ટિવિટી**: ઇન્ટરનેટ કનેક્શન ચકાસો, Wi-Fi અથવા મોબાઇલ ડેટા સક્રિય છે કે નહીં.
3. **બેટરી સ્થિતિ**: ડિવાઇસની બેટરી ચાર્જ ચકાસો.
4. **ડિવાઇસને પુનઃપ્રારંભ કરો**: ડિવાઇસને રીસ્ટાર્ટ કરો અને ફરીથી પ્રયાસ કરો.

જો સમસ્યા યથાવત રહે, તો કૃપા કરીને ગ્રાહક સપોર્ટને સંપર્ક કરો:
- **હેલ્પલાઇન નંબર**: (+91) 9380908040
- **ઈમેલ**: contact@fyllo.in

તમે વધુ માહિતી માટે આ વિડિઓઝ પણ જોઈ શકો છો:
- [ફসলની સ્ટેજ કેવી રીતે અપડેટ કરવી?](https://youtu.be/Gx2XUOGqNoA) (હિન્દી)
- [How to update crop stages in App?](https://youtu.be/knCXf0vdN7k) (English)

જો તમને વધુ મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
If an error is coming in the app, you can try the following steps:

1. **Check device**: Make sure the device is connected to the app.
2. **Network connectivity**: Check internet connection, whether Wi-Fi or mobile data is active.
3. **Battery status**: Check the battery charge of the device.
4. **Restart device**: Restart device and try again.

If the problem persists, please contact Customer Support:
- **Helpline number**: (+91) 9380908040
- **Email**: contact@fyllo.in

You can also check out these videos for more information:
- [How to update the stage of the horoscope?](https://youtu.be/Gx2XUOGqNoA) (Hindi)
- [How to update crop stages in App?](https://youtu.be/knCXf0vdN7k) (English)

If you need more help, let me know!

tools:
get_historical_irrigation_events  
Retrieves all the past detected farmer watering/irrigation event dates for all plots for the entire user history. Provides humanized output instead of numbers.

get_irrigation_installation_settings
    retrieves the irrigation installation settings in the farmer's plots, can be used to calculate the irrigation hours.
    returns root_width, root_depth, soil_retention, dripper_distance, dripper_discharge

should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.

get_optimal_soil_moistures  
Retrieves the optimal soil moisture values in kPa or percentage above which to irrigate for all plots. 0 kPa means wet, 200 kPa means dry soil. In percentage: 0% means dry, 100% means wet. In percentage values, irrigate when below the optimum range.
faq:
Q: How to measure/ calculate irrigation hours /water tank of my plot in fyllo app? How do I calculate irrigation hours for my plot? How to use the irrigation hours calculator?
A: To calculate irrigation hours in the Fyllo app, follow these steps:

1. Open the Fyllo App
2. Go to the home screen
3. Click on the soil moisture-1 sensor
4. Scroll down to find the "Irrigation hours" section
5. Fill in the required details such as:
   - Root width (inches)
   - Root depth (inches)
   - Soil retention (mm)
   - Dripper distance (feet)
   - Dripper discharge (liters)
6. Click the calculate button

Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for you right now? I can retrieve your plot's irrigation settings and perform the calculation if you say yes.

Tool Selection: When user says yes, I should:
1. Use get_irrigation_installation_settings tool to retrieve plot settings
2. Check if all values are present and valid
3. If values are valid, use calculate_irrigation_hours tool with these values
4. If values are missing or invalid, ask the user to provide the missing values
5. After calculating irrigation hours, display the irrigation installation settings that were used for the calculation
6. Ask the user if they want to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values, and if yes, prompt them to provide those values

Example response if values are missing:
"I checked your plot settings, but I need some additional information to calculate irrigation hours accurately. Could you please provide the [missing value(s)]? Once you provide these details, I can complete the calculation for you."

Example response after calculation:
"Based on your plot's irrigation settings, the calculated irrigation hours are [X] hours. 

I used the following settings for this calculation:
- Root width: [value] inches
- Root depth: [value] inches
- Soil retention: [value] mm
- Dripper distance: [value] feet
- Dripper discharge: [value] liters

Would you like to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values? If yes, please provide the new values you'd like to use."

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

How long has it been since you supplied water? It usually takes 12 hours for the water to reach the sensor. 

If the sensor's reading doesn't drop even after 12 hours, there may be a few reasons for this:

1. Water is not reaching the sensor properly, maybe the drip is blocked or the dripper outlets around the sensor are too far away.
2. If the sensor is old, i.e. more than two years old, it can be damaged.

Can you check the drip? Or do you want to open a ticket?

messages.content:
गर्भ धारणा साठी काही महत्त्वाचे उपाय खालीलप्रमाणे आहेत:

1. **सही पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन**: पाण्याची योग्य मात्रा आणि वेळेवर पाणी देणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. पाण्याची कमी किंवा जास्तीमुळे गर्भ धारणा प्रभावित होऊ शकते.

2. **सही खतांचा वापर**: योग्य प्रमाणात नायट्रोजन, फॉस्फरस आणि पोटॅशियम यांचा समावेश असलेले खत वापरा. यामुळे पिकांची वाढ आणि गर्भ धारणा सुधारते.

3. **फवारणी**: योग्य कीटकनाशक आणि फफूंदनाशकांचा वापर करून पिकांचे संरक्षण करा. यामुळे रोग आणि कीडांचा प्रभाव कमी होतो.

4. **पिकांची निवड**: स्थानिक वातावरणानुसार योग्य पिकांची निवड करा. स्थानिक पिके अधिक चांगली गर्भ धारणा देऊ शकतात.

5. **सही पिकांची काळजी**: पिकांची योग्य काळजी घेणे, जसे की छाटणी, काढणी, आणि इतर व्यवस्थापन पद्धती.

6. **मातीची चाचणी**: मातीची चाचणी करून त्यानुसार खतांचा वापर करा. मातीतील पोषण तत्वांची कमी किंवा जास्ती गर्भ धारणा प्रभावित करू शकते.

या उपायांचा अवलंब केल्यास गर्भ धारणा सुधारण्यास मदत होईल. तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी का?
messages.en:
Some of the important measures for pregnancy are as follows:

1. **Proper water management**: It is important to provide the right amount of water and timely watering. A lack or excess of water can affect fetal retention.

2. **Right fertilizer use**: Use fertilizer that contains the right amount of nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium. This improves crop growth and embryo retention.

3. **Spray**: Protect crops using proper pesticides and fungicides. This reduces the impact of disease and pests.

4. **Crop selection**: Choose the right crops according to the local environment. Local crops can provide better germination.

5. **Proper crop care**: Proper care of crops, such as pruning, harvesting, and other management methods.

6. **Soil test**: Test the soil and use fertilizers accordingly. Low or excess of nutrients in the soil can affect fetal retention.

Adopting these measures will help improve pregnancy perception. Is there anything else you need to know?

तुमच्या बागेत गर्भ धारणा साठी योग्य उपाययोजना करण्यासाठी खालील गोष्टींचा विचार करा:

1. **रोग आणि कीड नियंत्रण**: सध्या तुमच्या बागेत कोणतेही रोग किंवा कीड संबंधित मेट्रिक्स उपलब्ध नाहीत. त्यामुळे तुम्हाला रोग किंवा कीडांचा धोका नाही.

2. **पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन**: पाण्याची योग्य मात्रा देणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. पाण्याची कमी किंवा जास्ती गर्भ धारणा प्रभावित करू शकते.

3. **खतांचा वापर**: योग्य प्रमाणात खतांचा वापर करा, विशेषतः नायट्रोजन, फॉस्फरस आणि पोटॅशियम यांचा समावेश असलेले खत.

4. **पिकांची काळजी**: पिकांची योग्य काळजी घेणे, जसे की छाटणी, काढणी, आणि इतर व्यवस्थापन पद्धती.

5. **सही पिकांची निवड**: स्थानिक वातावरणानुसार योग्य पिकांची निवड करा.

तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी का?
messages.en:
Consider the following to take appropriate measures for pregnancy in your garden:

1. **Disease and Pest Control**: There are currently no disease or pest related metrics available in your garden. So you are not at risk of disease or pests.

2. **Water management**: It is important to give the right amount of water. Less or more water can affect fetal retention.

3. **Fertilizer use**: Use the right amount of fertilizer, especially fertilizer that includes nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium.

4. **Crop care**: Proper care of crops, such as pruning, harvesting, and other management methods.

5. **Choosing the right crops**: Choose the right crops according to the local environment.

Is there anything else you need to know?

messages.content:
फायोलो बसवण्याचे मुख्य उपयोग खालीलप्रमाणे आहेत:

1. **सटीक पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन**: फायोलोच्या सेन्सर्सद्वारे मातीतील आर्द्रता मोजली जाते, ज्यामुळे तुम्हाला पाण्याची आवश्यकता कधी आहे हे समजते.

2. **पिकांची आरोग्य स्थिती**: फायोलो तुम्हाला पिकांच्या आरोग्याची स्थिती आणि त्यांच्यावर होणाऱ्या रोगांचा धोका याबद्दल माहिती देते.

3. **खतांचा योग्य वापर**: फायोलोच्या मदतीने तुम्ही खतांचा योग्य वापर करू शकता, ज्यामुळे पिकांची वाढ सुधारते.

4. **जलवायूचे निरीक्षण**: फायोलो तुम्हाला हवामानाच्या बदलांची माहिती देते, ज्यामुळे तुम्ही योग्य वेळी पाण्याचा पुरवठा करू शकता.

5. **उत्पादन वाढवणे**: फायोलोच्या सटीक माहितीच्या आधारे तुम्ही तुमच्या पिकांचे उत्पादन वाढवू शकता.

फायोलोचा वापर करून तुम्ही तुमच्या शेतीच्या व्यवस्थापनात सुधारणा करू शकता. तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी का?
messages.en:
The main uses of installing a folo are as follows:

1. **Accurate water management**: Soil moisture is measured by Fiolo's sensors, which tell you when you need water.

2. **Crop Health Status**: Filo informs you about the health status of crops and the risk of diseases afflicted on them.

3. **Proper use of fertilizers**: With the help of filo, you can make proper use of fertilizers, which improves the growth of crops.

4. **Climate monitoring**: Fayolo informs you of climate change, allowing you to supply water at the right time.

5. **Increasing production**: You can increase the yield of your crops based on the exact information of the filo.

You can improve the management of your farm by using Fayolo. Is there anything else you need to know?

faq:
Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.
 - Agronomical Algorithms created by a team of scientists led by Dr. Shikhamany, who is considered by many as the father of Indian grape industry.
 - 100% customer retention: Fyllo is known for its service on the ground, 24-hour issue resolution.
 - User-friendly interface that's easy to understand for all language and age group users.

Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

Q: What is the Fyllo's accuracy?
A: Our all agronomical algorithms and insights have an accuracy of 95%.

Q: How can I trust that Fyllo's fertigation schedule is accurate?
A: Fyllo's fertigation schedule is scientifically developed and validated based on crop requirements. It takes into account factors such as crop variety, growth stage, soil conditions, and available nutrient data from soil, leaf, or petiole tests when available.

Q: Are you a chatgpt wrapper created by Fyllo?
A: No, I was fundamentally created by Fyllo AI.

messages.content:
It seems like you're experiencing issues with your sensors. Here are a few things you can check:

1. **Installation**: Ensure that the sensors are installed properly in the soil and not exposed to air.
2. **Moisture Accumulation**: If the sensor is showing 0 kPa for a long time, it might be due to moisture accumulation around the sensor. Check the surrounding area for any landscaping issues.
3. **Recent Installations**: If the sensors were recently installed, they might still be wet from the installation process.

Would you like me to create an issue ticket for this problem?

messages.content: વરસાદ નું સેન્સર કામ કરતું નથી
messages.en: The rain sensor doesn't work
messages.standalone_question: The sensor for the rain is not working.
messages.standalone_en: The sensor for the rain is not working.

faq:
Q: What should I do if the rain gauge is not working?
A: Open the top cover of the rainfall sensor and clean it as suggested in the maintenance section.

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: How do I know if my soil  moisture sensor is working fine ?
A: The only way to know is if after irrigation the sensor is dropping below 5 kpa and increasing continuously unless next irrigation is done. You can try putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. Also, a soil moisture reading of 0 kPa is perfectly fine, meaning wet soil, but a reading of 200 kPa could mean fault. If the soil moisture sensor reading is consistently at 0 from few 48 hours, then it could be anamolous (use live and historical hourly soil moisture data (use tool) to validate).

messages.content:
વરસાદનું સેન્સર કામ ન કરતું હોય તો, કૃપા કરીને નીચેના પગલાંઓ અનુસરો:

1. **સેન્સરનું ટોપ કવર ખોલો**: સેન્સરનું ટોપ કવર ખોલીને તેને સાફ કરો. ક્યારેક ધૂળ અથવા અન્ય અવરોધો સેન્સરનું કાર્ય અટકાવી શકે છે.

2. **સેન્સર કનેક્શન ચકાસો**: ખાતરી કરો કે સેન્સરનું કનેક્શન યોગ્ય રીતે છે અને તે યોગ્ય રીતે કાર્ય કરી રહ્યું છે.

3. **સેન્સરનું નિરીક્ષણ કરો**: જો સેન્સર જૂનું છે (બે વર્ષથી વધુ), તો તે ખોટું થઈ શકે છે. 

જો આ પગલાંઓ પછી પણ સમસ્યા યથાવત રહે, તો હું ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે ટિકિટ ઉઠાવી શકું છું. શું તમે ટિકિટ ઉઠાવવા માંગો છો?
messages.en:
If the rain sensor is not working, please follow the steps below:

1. **Open the top cover of the sensor**: Open the top cover of the sensor and clean it. Sometimes dust or other obstructions can stop the work of the sensor.

2. **Check sensor connection**: Make sure that the sensor connection is correctly and it is working properly.

3. **Observe the sensor**: If the sensor is old (more than two years), it may go wrong. 

If the problem persists even after these steps, I can pick up the ticket for technical support. Do you want to pick up the ticket?

messages.standalone_en: What is the purpose of these sources?

messages.content:
હવામાનની આગાહી માટેના સ્ત્રોતો વિવિધ પ્રકારના ડેટા પ્રદાન કરે છે, જેમ કે:

1. **જીવંત હવામાન ડેટા**: આમાં તાજા હવામાનની માહિતી, જેમ કે તાપમાન, આહલાદકતા, અને વરસાદનો સમાવેશ થાય છે.

2. **હવામાનની આગાહી**: આમાં આગામી દિવસો માટેની હવામાનની આગાહી હોય છે, જે ખેડૂતોને ખેતીની યોજના બનાવવા માટે મદદ કરે છે.

3. **હવામાનના ઐતિહાસિક ડેટા**: આમાં ભૂતકાળમાંના હવામાનના આંકડા હોય છે, જે ખેડૂતોને પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને વિકાસ માટેની શરતોને સમજવામાં મદદ કરે છે.

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે તમારા પાકની સંભાળ અને સંચાલન માટે યોગ્ય નિર્ણય લઈ શકો છો.
messages.en:
Sources for weather forecasting provide a variety of data, such as:

1. **Live weather data**: This includes fresh weather information, such as temperature, humidity, and rainfall.

2. **Weather Forecast**: This has a weather forecast for the coming days, which helps the farmers to plan for farming.

3. **Historical weather data**: These contain weather statistics from the past, which help farmers understand the conditions for crop growth and development.

Using this information, you can make the right decision for the care and management of your crops.

messages.content: આગાહી ખોટી કેમ છે
messages.en: Why the forecast is wrong
messages.standalone_question: Why is the weather forecast sometimes inaccurate?
messages.standalone_en: Why is the weather forecast sometimes inaccurate?

faq:
Q: What is the weather forecast accuracy?
A: Only Weather algorithms have an accuracy of 65-70%.

messages.content:
હવામાનની આગાહી ખોટી હોઈ શકે છે કારણ કે:

1. **અલ્ગોરિધમની મર્યાદા**: હવામાનની આગાહી માટેના અલ્ગોરિધમમાં 65-70% ની ચોકસાઈ હોય છે, જે ક્યારેક ખોટા પરિણામો આપી શકે છે.

2. **સ્થાનિક પરિસ્થિતિઓ**: સ્થાનિક પરિસ્થિતિઓ, જેમ કે ભૂગોળ, વાવાઝોડા, અને અન્ય પર્યાવરણના તત્વો, આગાહી પર અસર કરી શકે છે.

3. **ડેટા સ્રોતો**: જો હવામાનના ડેટા સ્રોતોમાં ખામી હોય, તો તે ખોટી આગાહીનું કારણ બની શકે છે.

4. **અનિશ્ચિતતા**: હવામાનમાં સ્વાભાવિક અનિશ્ચિતતા હોય છે, જે આગાહી કરવામાં મુશ્કેલીઓ ઊભી કરી શકે છે.

જો તમને ચોકસાઈની જરૂર હોય, તો જીવંત ડેટા અથવા અન્ય સ્ત્રોતોનો ઉપયોગ કરવો વધુ સારું રહેશે.
messages.en:
The weather forecast may be incorrect because:

1. Limitation of the **algorithm**: The algorithm for weather forecasting has an accuracy of 65-70%, which can sometimes give wrong results.

2. **Local conditions**: Local conditions, such as elements of geography, hurricanes, and other environments, can affect forecasting.

3. **Data sources**: If there is a flaw in weather data sources, it can lead to incorrect forecasts.

4. **Uncertainty**: There is a natural uncertainty in the weather, which can create difficulties in making predictions.

If you need accuracy, it would be better to use live data or other sources.

faq:
Q: What should I do if the soil temperature sensor is not working?
A: Check the sensor connection, tighten it if loose, and restart the device to check updated data.

messages.content:
Sensor चालत नाही असे दिसत आहे. कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **सेंसर कनेक्शन**: सेंसर चांगल्या प्रकारे जोडलेला आहे का? जर तो सैल असेल तर त्याला घट्ट करा.
2. **पाण्याची पोहोच**: पाण्याची पोहोच सेंसरपर्यंत होत आहे का? पाण्याचा प्रवाह चांगला आहे का हे तपासा.
3. **सेंसरची वयोमर्यादा**: जर सेंसर दोन वर्षांपेक्षा जुना असेल, तर तो खराब झाला असू शकतो. 

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याची इच्छा आहे का?
messages.en:
The sensor doesn't seem to be working. Please check the following:

1. **Sensor connection**: Is the sensor connected well? If it's loose, tighten it.
2. **Water access**: Is water reaching the sensor? Check if the water flow is good.
3. Age limit of the sensor**: If the sensor is more than two years old, it may have been damaged. 

If you're still having a problem, do you want to open a ticket?

4. **डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा** - काही वेळा डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट केल्याने समस्या सोडवता येते.

जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर कृपया आमच्या समर्थन टीमशी संपर्क साधा. आपल्याला अधिक मदतीची आवश्यकता असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
Your data plan is active and valid until 2025-07-11. 

Your device is currently active and sending data correctly. 

If your data is not visible on your mobile, please check the following:

1. **Is the device connected to the app?** - Make sure your device is connected to the app.
2. **Network connectivity** - Check internet connection.
3. **Battery status** - Check that the device's battery is good.
4. **Restart the device** - Sometimes restarting the device can solve the problem.

If the problem persists, please contact our support team. If you need more help, please let me know!

faq:
Q: I irrigated still the sensor is showing dry.
A: Ask user when he irrigated. It usually takes 12 hours to reach the water till sensor. If the sensor is not dropping even after 12 hours, it can be due to one of the following reasons :
Water is not reaching properly till the sensor , this can be due to drip blocked , or slope in the land or dripper outlets far away from the sensor. Ask user to check if drip is fine and  dripper is within the range of sensor. 
The sensor can be very old , more than two years , in this case , the sensor might be malfunction, ask user if he wants to raise a ticket

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

messages.content:
तुम्ही सांगितल्याप्रमाणे, दुसरा सेन्सर 79% आर्द्रता दर्शवत आहे, जो 90% च्या अपेक्षेपेक्षा कमी आहे. तुम्ही पाणी दिल्यानंतर 12 तासांनी मातीच्या आर्द्रतेत बदल अपेक्षित आहे. 

तुम्ही पाणी दिले आहे का? जर तुम्ही 12 तासांपूर्वी पाणी दिले असेल आणि आर्द्रता अजूनही कमी आहे, तर काही कारणे असू शकतात:

1. **ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा**: ड्रिप अडथळा झाला आहे का? 
2. **सेंसरची स्थिती**: सेंसर मातीच्या योग्य खोलीत आहे का? 
3. **जुना सेंसर**: सेंसर 2 वर्षांपेक्षा जुना आहे का? 

कृपया या गोष्टी तपासा. तुम्हाला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता आहे का?
messages.en:
As you mentioned, the second sensor is showing 79% humidity, which is lower than expected at 90%. Soil moisture is expected to change 12 hours after you water. 

Have you given water? If you watered 12 hours ago and the humidity is still low, there may be a few reasons:

1. **Barrier in drip system**: Is there a drip barrier? 
2. **Position of the sensor**: Is the sensor at the right depth of the soil? 
3. **Old sensor**: Is the sensor more than 2 years old? 

Please check these things. Do you need any more help?

messages.standalone_en: Has it been two days since you watered with 100mm, yet the second sensor still reads 79% humidity?

faq:
Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is showing dry.
A: Ask user when he irrigated. It usually takes 12 hours to reach the water till sensor. If the sensor is not dropping even after 12 hours, it can be due to one of the following reasons :
Water is not reaching properly till the sensor , this can be due to drip blocked , or slope in the land or dripper outlets far away from the sensor. Ask user to check if drip is fine and  dripper is within the range of sensor. 
The sensor can be very old , more than two years , in this case , the sensor might be malfunction, ask user if he wants to raise a ticket

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: In the latest irrigation , sensor didn't drop to 0.
A: 0 to 5 Kpa means soil is fully wet. It need not drop to 0 every time. Moisture less than 5 also means wet conditions. So, need not worry. Also ask to wait for 12 hours after irrigation.

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

messages.content:
तुम्ही 100 मिमी पाणी दिल्यानंतर 2 दिवस झाले आहेत, तरीही दुसरा सेन्सर 79% आर्द्रता दर्शवत आहे. हे काही कारणांमुळे असू शकते:

1. **पाण्याचा पोहचण्याचा वेळ**: पाणी मुळांच्या क्षेत्रात पोहोचण्यासाठी 12 तास लागतात. तुम्ही पाणी दिल्यानंतर 12 तासांनी आर्द्रता तपासली का?
  
2. **ड्रिप सिस्टीम**: ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा आहे का? ड्रिपच्या बाहेरच्या ठिकाणी पाणी पोहोचत आहे का?

3. **सेंसरची स्थिती**: सेंसर योग्य खोलीत आहे का? कधी कधी, मातीच्या वरच्या स्तरावर ओलसरता असली तरी, मुळांच्या क्षेत्रात पाणी कमी असू शकते.

तुम्ही मातीच्या आसपासच्या क्षेत्रात आर्द्रता तपासली का? जर तुम्हाला शंका असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडू इच्छिता का?
messages.en:
It's been 2 days since you gave 100mm of water, yet the second sensor is showing 79% humidity. This may be due to a few reasons:

1. **Water reach time**: It takes 12 hours for water to reach the root area. Did you check humidity 12 hours after you watered?
  
2. **Drip System**: Is there a barrier to the drip system? Is water reaching the outside of the drip?

3. **Position of the sensor**: Is the sensor in the right room? Sometimes, although there is moisture in the upper layer of the soil, there may be less water in the area of the roots.

Did you check humidity in the area around the soil? If you have doubts, would you like to open the ticket?

faq:
Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor values fluctuate?
A: Ensure the sensor is installed properly in the soil, check for air bubbles, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

तुम्ही मातीच्या आर्द्रतेच्या सेन्सरच्या आसपासच्या क्षेत्रात आर्द्रता तपासली का? जर तुम्हाला तिथे ओलसरता आढळली, तर तुम्हाला पाणी देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

जर तुम्हाला आर्द्रता कमी आढळली, तर तुम्ही पाणी देऊ शकता. तुम्हाला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता आहे का?

If you find moisture low, you can provide water. Do you need any more help?

faq:
Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: How do I know if my soil  moisture sensor is working fine ?
A: The only way to know is if after irrigation the sensor is dropping below 5 kpa and increasing continuously unless next irrigation is done. You can try putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. Also, a soil moisture reading of 0 kPa is perfectly fine, meaning wet soil, but a reading of 200 kPa could mean fault. If the soil moisture sensor reading is consistently at 0 from few 48 hours, then it could be anamolous (use live and historical hourly soil moisture data (use tool) to validate).

messages.en:

1. **Position of the sensor**: Is the sensor in the right depth? 
2. **Age of the sensor**: If the sensor is older than 2 years, it may have been damaged.
3. **Drip System**: Is there a barrier to the drip system?

Do you want to open a ticket? This will help in obtaining technical assistance.

faq:
Q: How do I contact customer support for Fyllo?
A: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in. Do you want me to raise a support ticket for you?

Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.
 - Agronomical Algorithms created by a team of scientists led by Dr. Shikhamany, who is considered by many as the father of Indian grape industry.
 - 100% customer retention: Fyllo is known for its service on the ground, 24-hour issue resolution.
 - User-friendly interface that's easy to understand for all language and age group users.

Q: What is the Fyllo's accuracy?
A: Our all agronomical algorithms and insights have an accuracy of 95%.

Q: My Kairo/Nero device is not working.
A: If some issue is being faced, user can raise the support ticket in the Fyllo app. If the issue is not solved please contact Fyllo customer support for further assistance. Do you want me to raise the support ticket for you?

messages.content: I'm here to assist you with any issues related to your Fyllo device or agricultural practices. If you're experiencing problems, please let me know the specific issue you're facing, and I'll do my best to help you resolve it. Whether it's related to sensor readings, irrigation, pest management, or any other aspect, I'm here to support you!
messages.en: I'm here to assist you with any issues related to your Fyllo device or agricultural practices. If you're experiencing problems, please let me know the specific issue you're facing, and I'll do my best to help you resolve it. Whether it's related to sensor readings, irrigation, pest management, or any other aspect, I'm here to support you!

A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.

Q: What is the current battery health and battery level of my Fyllo device?
A: I'll check the battery information for your device. Let me gather that information for you.

Q: Why is there a need for an annual recharge for Fyllo devices?
A: Annual recharge for the sim card is done to send and receive the data from our server whenever required.

tools:
live_sensor_data  
Provides the live / most recent sensor data for the plots, last received from the sensors. The data fields could be of these types: airTemperature, airHumidity, soilTemperature, soilMoisture1, soilMoisture2, leafWetness, airPressure, baroPressure, lightIntensity (lux), uvIndex, windSpeed, windDirection, instantaneous rainfall, battery percentage, vaporPressure. Depending on device type, some data may not be available.

get_historical_daily_weather_data  
Fetches daily historical weather data from all plot sensors for the given date range, including air temperature, air humidity, and rainfall. Suitable for larger durations.

get_historical_hourly_weather_data  
Fetches hourly historical weather data from all plot sensors for the given datetime range, including air temperature, air humidity, and rainfall. Suitable only for less than 5 days duration.

messages.standalone_question: Is the soil dry?
messages.standalone_en: Is the soil dry?

faq:
Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

messages.standalone_question: Could you please check the irrigation forecast for the plots?
messages.standalone_en: Could you please check the irrigation forecast for the plots?

tools:
get_irrigation_forecast  
Gives the irrigation requirement forecast for any day, today and beyond. Dates are mandatory. Output is humanized with day of the week and optimal moisture details if suitable.

get_hourly_weather_forecast  
Provides hourly weather forecast for today and the next 4 days for the farmer's plots. Use only for forecast, not actual measured values.

check_spray_conditions  
Gets the spray condition forecast for the next few hours for the farmer's plots and returns the condition for each hour as GOOD, MODERATE, or WORST, based on deltaT, VPD, and rainfall conditions.

get_daily_weather_forecast  
Provides the next 14 days from today, daily weather forecast for the farmer's plots. Use only for forecast, not current values.

get_irrigation_installation_settings
    retrieves the irrigation installation settings in the farmer's plots, can be used to calculate the irrigation hours.
    returns root_width, root_depth, soil_retention, dripper_distance, dripper_discharge
faq:
Q: How to measure/ calculate irrigation hours /water tank of my plot in fyllo app? How do I calculate irrigation hours for my plot? How to use the irrigation hours calculator?
A: To calculate irrigation hours in the Fyllo app, follow these steps:

1. Open the Fyllo App
2. Go to the home screen
3. Click on the soil moisture-1 sensor
4. Scroll down to find the "Irrigation hours" section
5. Fill in the required details such as:
   - Root width (inches)
   - Root depth (inches)
   - Soil retention (mm)
   - Dripper distance (feet)
   - Dripper discharge (liters)
6. Click the calculate button

Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for you right now? I can retrieve your plot's irrigation settings and perform the calculation if you say yes.

Tool Selection: When user says yes, I should:
1. Use get_irrigation_installation_settings tool to retrieve plot settings
2. Check if all values are present and valid
3. If values are valid, use calculate_irrigation_hours tool with these values
4. If values are missing or invalid, ask the user to provide the missing values
5. After calculating irrigation hours, display the irrigation installation settings that were used for the calculation
6. Ask the user if they want to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values, and if yes, prompt them to provide those values

Example response if values are missing:
"I checked your plot settings, but I need some additional information to calculate irrigation hours accurately. Could you please provide the [missing value(s)]? Once you provide these details, I can complete the calculation for you."

Example response after calculation:
"Based on your plot's irrigation settings, the calculated irrigation hours are [X] hours. 

I used the following settings for this calculation:
- Root width: [value] inches
- Root depth: [value] inches
- Soil retention: [value] mm
- Dripper distance: [value] feet
- Dripper discharge: [value] liters

Would you like to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values? If yes, please provide the new values you'd like to use."

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

### તાજેતરના ડેટા:
- **23 એપ્રિલ 2025**: 
  - 17:00 - 0 kPa
  - 16:00 - 0 kPa
  - 15:00 - 0 kPa
  - 14:00 - 0 kPa
  - 13:00 - 6 kPa

### પાકની સ્થિતિ:
- **વર્તમાન સ્ટેજ**: VEGETATIVE (વૃદ્ધિ)
- **આગામી સ્ટેજ**: FLOWERING (ફૂલોનું ઉદ્ભવ)

### નિષ્કર્ષ:
1. **જમીન ભીની છે**: 0 kPa એટલે કે જમીન ભીની છે, જે સામાન્ય છે.
2. **સેન્સર સમસ્યા**: જો જમીન ભીની છે અને સેન્સર 0 kPa બતાવી રહ્યું છે, તો સેન્સર ખરાબ થઈ શકે છે. 

**કૃપા કરીને ચકાસો**:
- શું જમીન સેન્સર નજીક ભીની છે?
- જો જમીન ભીની છે અને સેન્સર 0 kPa બતાવી રહ્યું છે, તો શું તમે ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે ટિકિટ ઉઠાવવી ઇચ્છો છો?
messages.en:
The machine in the TARAK plot is showing 0 kPa, which is wet on the ground. But, in the last few days, mostly only 0 kPa has been visible. 

### Recent data:
* **23 April 2025**: 
  - 17:00 - 0 kPa
  - 16:00 - 0 kPa
  - 15:00 - 0 kPa
  - 14:00 - 0 kPa
  - 13:00 - 6 kPa

### Crop condition:
- **Current stage**: VEGETATIVE (growth)
- **Next stage**: FLOWERING (emergence of flowers)

### Conclusion:
1. **The ground is wet**: 0 kPa i.e. the ground is wet, which is normal.
2. **Sensor problem**: If the ground is wet and the sensor is showing 0 kPa, the sensor may be damaged. 

**Please check**:
- Is the ground wet near the sensor?
- If the ground is wet and the sensor is showing 0 kPa, would you like to pick up the ticket for technical support?

messages.content:
તમારા TARAK પ્લોટમાં સેન્સર 0 kPa બતાવી રહ્યું છે, જે જમીન ભીની છે. જો કે, જો આ સ્થિતિ લાંબા સમયથી ચાલુ છે, તો સેન્સર ખરાબ થઈ શકે છે.

### શું કરવું:
1. **સેન્સર કનેક્શન તપાસો**: જો તે ઢીલો હોય તો તેને કડક કરો.
2. **ડિવાઇસને પુનઃપ્રારંભ કરો**: અપડેટ થયેલ ડેટા તપાસો.
3. **જમીનની સ્થિતિ તપાસો**: જો જમીન ખરેખર ભીની છે, તો સેન્સર ખરાબ થઈ શકે છે.

શું તમે ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે ટિકિટ ઉઠાવવી ઇચ્છો છો?
messages.en:
The sensor in your TARAK plot is showing 0 kPa, which is wet on the ground. However, if this situation has been going on for a long time, the sensor can get worse.

### What to do:
1. **Check sensor connection**: Tighten it if it is loose.
2. **Restart device**: Check the updated data.
3. **Check the condition of the ground**: If the ground is really wet, the sensor can get damaged.

Do you want to pick up a ticket for technical support?

2. **ડિવાઇસને પુનઃપ્રારંભ કરો**: અપડેટ થયેલ ડેટા તપાસો.
3. **જમીનની સ્થિતિ તપાસો**: જો જમીન ખરેખર ભીની છે, તો સેન્સર ખરાબ થઈ શકે છે.

શું તમે ટેકનિકલ સપોર્ટ માટે ટિકિટ ઉઠાવવી ઇચ્છો છો?
messages.en:
If the sensor in the TARAK plot is faulty and is showing 0 kPa, you can pick up the ticket for technical support to solve this problem.

### Process of picking up tickets for technical support:
1. **Check sensor connection**: Tighten it if it is loose.
2. **Restart device**: Check the updated data.
3. **Check the condition of the ground**: If the ground is really wet, the sensor can get damaged.

Do you want to pick up a ticket for technical support?

messages.content: पाण्याची माहिती आठ दिवसापासून तीच
messages.en: The water information has been the same for eight days.
messages.standalone_question: What information do you have about the water situation over the past eight days?
messages.standalone_en: What information do you have about the water situation over the past eight days?

messages.content:
आपण पाणी कधी दिले होते? पाण्याला मातीपर्यंत पोहोचण्यासाठी साधारणतः 12 तास लागतात. जर 12 तासांनंतरही सेन्सरचे वाचन कमी होत नसेल, तर यामागील काही कारणे असू शकतात:

1. **ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा**: ड्रिप बंद झालेले असू शकते.
2. **जमिनीचा उतार**: पाण्याला सेन्सरपर्यंत पोहोचण्यात अडथळा येत असेल.
3. **सेन्सरची जुनी अवस्था**: जर सेन्सर दोन वर्षांपेक्षा जुना असेल, तर तो खराब होऊ शकतो.

कृपया तपासा की ड्रिप सिस्टीम व्यवस्थित कार्यरत आहे का आणि सेन्सरच्या रेंजमध्ये ड्रिपर आहे का. जर आपल्याला अजून काही शंका असेल, तर मी तिकीट उघडण्यास मदत करू शकतो.
messages.en:
When did you give water? It usually takes 12 hours for the water to reach the soil. If the sensor's reading doesn't drop even after 12 hours, there may be a few reasons for this:

1. **Barrier in drip system**: The drip may be closed.
2. **Ground slope**: Water is obstructing access to sensors.
3. **Old state of the sensor**: If the sensor is more than two years old, it can deteriorate.

Please check if the drip system is working properly and if there is a dripper within the range of the sensors. If you have any more doubts, I can help you open tickets.

messages.en: Good! If all goes well, you can focus on managing your crops. Do you want water, fertilizer, or any other information? Please tell me, I'm willing to help.

messages.standalone_en: What is the current percentage of water given?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.

messages.content:
आपण पाण्याची टक्केवारी स्थिर असल्याचे सांगितले आहे. याचा अर्थ असा होऊ शकतो की:

1. **पाण्याची गरज कमी आहे**: पिकाची वाढ किंवा विकासाची अवस्था कमी पाण्याची आवश्यकता दर्शवू शकते.
2. **मातीतील पाण्याची साठवण**: मातीने पाण्याची साठवण केली असेल, ज्यामुळे सेन्सर वाचन स्थिर राहते.
3. **सेन्सरची अचूकता**: सेन्सरची अचूकता तपासणे आवश्यक आहे, कारण ते चुकीची माहिती देऊ शकते.

आपण पाण्याची गरज असलेल्या स्थितीत असल्यास, मी पाण्याच्या आवश्यकतेसाठी एक अंदाज देऊ शकतो. कृपया मला आपल्या प्लॉटसाठी सध्याची मातीची आर्द्रता (kPa) वाचन द्या, जेणेकरून मी अधिक माहिती देऊ शकेन.
messages.en:
We have said that the water percentage is stable. This may mean:

1. **Water requirement is low**: The growth or development stage of the crop may indicate the need for less water.
2. **Soil water storage**: The soil may have stored water, which keeps the sensor reading constant.
3. **The accuracy of the sensor**: It is necessary to check the accuracy of the sensor, as it can give wrong information.

If you're in a water-needed situation, I can give an estimate for water needs. Please give me the current soil moisture (kPa) reading for your plot, so that I can give more information.

messages.content:
जर बॅटरी पिन चांगली आहे आणि रिचार्ज देखील झाला आहे, तरीही डिव्हाइस काम करत नसेल, तर कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **सेंसर कनेक्शन**: सेंसर कनेक्शन तपासा, कनेक्शन ढिले असल्यास ते घट्ट करा.
2. **डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा**: डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करून पाहा, कधी कधी हे समस्या सोडवते.
3. **सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा**: जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर कृपया Fyllo अॅपवर सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा.

तुमच्या समस्येवर लवकरच उपाय मिळावा अशी आशा आहे.
messages.en:
If the battery pin is good and recharged, yet the device is not working, please check the following:

1. **Sensor Connection**: Check the sensor connection, tighten it if the connection is loose.
2. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart, sometimes it solves the problem.
3. **Open support ticket**: If the problem persists, please open the support ticket on the Fyllo app.

I hope your problem is resolved soon.

messages.content:
जर तुम्ही सेंसर रीसेट केला आहे तरीही तो काम करत नसेल, तर खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **सेंसर कनेक्शन**: सेंसरच्या कनेक्शनला पुन्हा एकदा तपासा. कनेक्शन ढिले असल्यास ते घट्ट करा.
2. **सेंसरची वयोमर्यादा**: जर सेंसर दोन वर्षांपेक्षा जुना असेल, तर तो खराब झाला असू शकतो.
3. **डिव्हाइसची स्थिती**: डिव्हाइसच्या स्थितीची तपासणी करा, काही वेळा हार्डवेअर समस्या असू शकतात.

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर कृपया Fyllo अॅपवर सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा.
messages.en:
If you've reset the sensor but it's not working, check the following:

1. **Sensor Connection**: Re-examine the sensor's connection. If the connection is loose, tighten it.
2. Age limit of the sensor**: If the sensor is more than two years old, it may have been damaged.
3. **Position of the device**: Check the position of the device, sometimes there may be hardware issues.

If you are still having problems, please open the support ticket on the Fyllo app.

messages.content:
जर तुमचा सेंसर नवीन आहे आणि कनेक्शन घट्ट आहे, तरीही 200 kPa दर्शवित असेल, तर खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **पाण्याची पोहोच**: तुम्ही शेवटचा पाण्याचा साठा कधी केला? पाण्याचा साठा केल्यानंतर 12 तासांनी सेंसरच्या वाचनात बदल होणे अपेक्षित आहे. 
2. **ड्रिप सिस्टीम**: ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये कोणतीही अडथळा आहे का? ड्रिप बंद आहे का किंवा सेंसरच्या जवळ नाही का? 
3. **स्थळाची झुकाव**: तुमच्या जमिनीवर झुकाव असल्यास, पाणी सेंसरपर्यंत पोहोचत नसेल.

जर तुम्ही हे सर्व तपासले आणि समस्या कायम राहिली, तर कृपया Fyllo अॅपवर सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा.
messages.en:
If your sensor is new and the connection is tight, still showing 200 kPa, check the following:

1. **Water access**: When was the last time you stocked water? Sensor readings are expected to change 12 hours after water storage. 
2. **Drip System**: Is there a barrier to the drip system? Is the drip closed or not close to the sensor? 
3. **Place tilt**: If you have a tilt on the ground, the water will not reach the sensor.

If you check all of this and the problem persists, please open the support ticket on the Fyllo app.

messages.standalone_question: My device has not been working for two days. What should I do?
messages.standalone_en: My device has not been working for two days. What should I do?

messages.content:
If your Kairo device has not been working for two days, please check the following:

1. **Recharge Status**: Ensure that your data plan is active and has not expired.
2. **Device Connection**: Verify that the device is properly connected and not loose.
3. **Network Connectivity**: Check if there is a stable internet connection.
4. **Battery Status**: Ensure the device has sufficient battery power.

If everything seems fine and the device is still not working, please raise a support ticket in the Fyllo app for further assistance.

messages.content: Karnata state farmer pls guide
messages.en: Karnata state farmer pls guide
messages.standalone_question: Can you provide guidance for farmers in Karnataka?
messages.standalone_en: Can you provide guidance for farmers in Karnataka?

messages.content:
As a farmer in Karnataka, here are some general guidelines for managing your grape crop:

1. **Soil Health**: Ensure your black soil is well-aerated and has good drainage. Regularly test the soil for nutrient levels and pH.

2. **Irrigation**: Monitor soil moisture levels. Grapes require consistent moisture, especially during the berry development stage. Use drip irrigation for efficient water use.

3. **Fertigation**: Apply fertilizers through the irrigation system during the active growth stages. Ensure you follow the recommended schedule for your grape variety.

4. **Pest Control**: Regularly check for pests like mealybugs and aphids. Use integrated pest management (IPM) practices, including biological controls and targeted pesticide applications.

5. **Disease Management**: Watch for diseases such as powdery mildew and downy mildew. Use fungicides as preventive measures during wet conditions.

6. **Pruning**: Proper pruning is essential for grapevines. Ensure you prune at the right time to promote healthy growth and fruit production.

7. **Weather Monitoring**: Keep an eye on local weather forecasts to anticipate any adverse conditions that may affect your crop.

If you have specific questions or need assistance with a particular aspect of your grape farming, feel free to ask!
messages.en:

3. **Fertigation**: Apply fertilizers through the irrigation system during the active growth stages. Ensure you follow the recommended schedule for your grape variety.

4. **Pest Control**: Regularly check for pests like mealybugs and aphids. Use integrated pest management (IPM) practices, including biological controls and targeted pesticide applications.

5. **Disease Management**: Watch for diseases such as powdery mildew and downy mildew. Use fungicides as preventive measures during wet conditions.

6. **Pruning**: Proper pruning is essential for grapevines. Ensure you prune at the right time to promote healthy growth and fruit production.

faq:
Q: How do I start the Kairo device?
A: Press the switch below the top cap to start the device and wait until the parameters on the home screen are visible.

Q: How do I install the Fyllo app for Kairo?
A: Scan the QR code provided in the manual, click on the install button, and follow the instructions to download the app.

Q: How do I connect the Kairo device to the Fyllo app?
A: After installing the Fyllo app and entering the required details, connect the device by scanning the code sticker on the device.

Q: How do I insert batteries into the Kairo device?
A: Insert 2xAA batteries into the battery compartment, and ensure the LED indicator turns on and flashes every 16 seconds.

messages.content: मग असे असेलतर फायलो संच चा काय फायदा
messages.en: So if so, what is the use of a filo set?
messages.standalone_question: What is the benefit of the Phylo system if that is the case?
messages.standalone_en: What is the benefit of the Phylo system if that is the case?

messages.content:
फायलो संचाचे अनेक फायदे आहेत:

1. **सटीकता आणि अचूकता**: फायलोच्या अद्वितीय स्थापना आणि सेन्सर स्थानामुळे माती आणि पिकांची अचूक माहिती मिळते.

2. **वैज्ञानिक अल्गोरिदम**: डॉ. शिखामणी यांच्या नेतृत्वाखाली तयार केलेले कृषी अल्गोरिदम, जे भारतीय द्राक्ष उद्योगात मान्यताप्राप्त आहेत.

3. **ग्राहक सेवा**: 24 तासांच्या समस्यांचे निराकरण आणि उत्कृष्ट ग्राहक सेवा, ज्यामुळे 100% ग्राहक टिकाव आहे.

4. **सुलभ वापर**: सर्व वयोगट आणि भाषांमध्ये समजण्यास सोपे इंटरफेस.

5. **पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन**: मातीतील आर्द्रता वाचनावर आधारित पाण्याची गरज आणि वेळेवर सूचना.

6. **रोग आणि कीड व्यवस्थापन**: रोग आणि कीडांच्या संभाव्य धोक्यांबाबत सूचना देणे.

7. **फर्टिगेशन व्यवस्थापन**: पिकांच्या आवश्यकतेनुसार पोषण व्यवस्थापन.

फायलो संचामुळे शेतकऱ्यांना त्यांच्या पिकांचे उत्पादन वाढविण्यात आणि संसाधनांचे योग्य व्यवस्थापन करण्यात मदत होते.
messages.en:
The filo set has several advantages:

1. **Accuracy and accuracy**: Filo's unique installation and sensor location provides accurate soil and crop information.

2. **Scientific algorithms**: Dr. Agricultural algorithms led by Shikhamani, who are recognised in the Indian grape industry.

3. **Customer service**: 24-hour problem solving and excellent customer service, which leads to 100% customer durability.

4. **Easy use**: Easy-to-understand interfaces across all ages and languages.

5. **Water management**: Water needs and timely instructions based on soil moisture reading.

6. **Disease and Pest Management**: Informing about the potential dangers of disease and pests.

7. **Fertigation Management**: Nutrition management according to crop requirements.

The filo set helps farmers increase the yield of their crops and manage resources properly.

आपल्या बागेतील संच योग्य पद्धतीने काम करावा यासाठी, कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **रिचार्ज स्थिती**: आपल्या उपकरणाचे रिचार्ज झाले आहे का ते तपासा. रिचार्ज न झाल्यास, उपकरण कार्य करणार नाही.

2. **डेटा पाठवणे**: उपकरण सक्रियपणे डेटा पाठवत आहे का ते तपासा. जर डेटा पाठवत नसेल, तर कनेक्शन तपासा.

3. **सेंसर कनेक्शन**: जर कोणतेही सेंसर कार्य करत नसतील, तर त्यांचे कनेक्शन तपासा आणि आवश्यक असल्यास त्यांना पुन्हा सुरू करा.

जर या सर्व गोष्टी तपासल्यानंतरही समस्या कायम राहिली, तर कृपया Fyllo अॅपवर सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा. 

आपल्याला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता असल्यास, कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
To make sure your garden set works properly, please check the following:

1. **Recharge status**: Check if your device has been recharged. If not recharged, the device won't work.

2. **Sending data**: Check if the device is actively sending data. If the data is not sending, check the connection.

3. **Sensor Connection**: If any sensors are not working, check their connection and restart them if necessary.

If the problem persists even after checking all of these things, please open the support ticket on the Fyllo app. 

If you need any more help, please let me know.

messages.content:
आपण आपल्या बागेतील संचाच्या समस्येबद्दल विचार करत आहात, त्यामुळे मी काही तपासणी करू शकतो. 

आपल्या "Thompson plot 1" साठी मी सध्या उपलब्ध असलेल्या डेटा तपासून पाहतो. कृपया थोडा वेळ द्या.:

"Thompson plot 1" साठी सध्या उपलब्ध असलेल्या डेटा खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

- **मातीचे तापमान**: 20.94°C
- **मातीची आर्द्रता**: 
  - Sensor 1: 7 kPa (ज्यामुळे माती ओलसर आहे)
  - Sensor 2: 0 kPa (ज्यामुळे माती खूप ओलसर आहे)
- **बॅटरी स्थिती**: 83%
- **Vi (वोल्टेज इनपुट)**: 9V

संच चांगले कार्य करत असल्याचे दिसते, कारण मातीची आर्द्रता कमी आहे. जर आपल्याला आणखी काही तपासायचे असेल किंवा समस्या असल्यास, कृपया सांगा.

messages.content:
कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **बॅटरी कनेक्शन**: बॅटरी योग्य प्रकारे कनेक्ट केलेली आहे का ते तपासा.
2. **बॅटरी प्रकार**: योग्य प्रकारच्या बॅटरीचा वापर केला जात आहे का ते पाहा.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती**: बॅटरी जुनी किंवा खराब झाली आहे का ते तपासा.

जर सर्व काही व्यवस्थित असेल तरीही बॅटरी चार्ज होत नसेल, तर कृपया Fyllo अॅपवर सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा.

messages.content:
जर बॅटरी खराब झाली असेल, तर तुम्हाला नवीन बॅटरी खरेदी करण्याची आवश्यकता आहे. कृपया खालील गोष्टींचा विचार करा:

1. **बॅटरी बदलणे**: नवीन बॅटरी खरेदी करा आणि जुनी बॅटरी बदलून पहा.
2. **सपोर्ट तिकीट**: जर तुम्हाला बॅटरी बदलण्यात किंवा इतर कोणत्याही समस्येत मदतीची आवश्यकता असेल, तर Fyllo अॅपवर सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा.

messages.standalone_question: At what temperature can cold damage potatoes?
messages.standalone_en: At what temperature can cold damage potatoes?

faq:
Q: What is the temperature at which cold/Frost/Paala(Hindi) will burn/damage the potato crop?
A: Cold will burn the potato crop at 5 degrees Celsius and less. The minimum safe temperature for a potato crop to be left in so that it can survive is 6 degrees Celsius, so it is suggested to keep your crop above this value.
Storing potatoes at a given temperature and letting the potato crop be in the field at a certain atmospheric temperature are two different things. If the question is not clear, or the user needs more info, prompt the user to contact the CRM team at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in as we don't have informaion about storage of potato.

messages.standalone_en: What measures can be taken to protect potato crops from cold temperatures?

faq:
Q: What is the temperature at which cold/Frost/Paala(Hindi) will burn/damage the potato crop?
A: Cold will burn the potato crop at 5 degrees Celsius and less. The minimum safe temperature for a potato crop to be left in so that it can survive is 6 degrees Celsius, so it is suggested to keep your crop above this value.
Storing potatoes at a given temperature and letting the potato crop be in the field at a certain atmospheric temperature are two different things. If the question is not clear, or the user needs more info, prompt the user to contact the CRM team at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in as we don't have informaion about storage of potato.

messages.content:
आलू की फसल को ठंड से बचाने के लिए निम्नलिखित उपाय करें:

1. **मल्चिंग**: मिट्टी की सतह पर सूखी पत्तियाँ या स्ट्रॉ डालें, जिससे तापमान को स्थिर रखने में मदद मिलेगी।

2. **कवर फसल**: रात के समय आलू के पौधों को कवर करने के लिए कपड़ा या प्लास्टिक का उपयोग करें, जिससे ठंडी हवा से बचाव होगा।

3. **सिंचाई**: सिंचाई करने से मिट्टी का तापमान बढ़ सकता है, जिससे पौधों को ठंड से बचाने में मदद मिलती है।

4. **फसल की सही समय पर बुवाई**: आलू की बुवाई का समय सही रखें ताकि फसल ठंड के मौसम में न हो।

5. **पौधों की देखभाल**: पौधों को स्वस्थ रखने के लिए उचित पोषण और कीट नियंत्रण का ध्यान रखें।

इन उपायों से आप अपनी आलू की फसल को ठंड से बचा सकते हैं।
ठंड से बचाने के लिए मिट्टी का तापमान कितना रखे

faq:
Q: What is the temperature at which cold/Frost/Paala(Hindi) will burn/damage the potato crop?
A: Cold will burn the potato crop at 5 degrees Celsius and less. The minimum safe temperature for a potato crop to be left in so that it can survive is 6 degrees Celsius, so it is suggested to keep your crop above this value.
Storing potatoes at a given temperature and letting the potato crop be in the field at a certain atmospheric temperature are two different things. If the question is not clear, or the user needs more info, prompt the user to contact the CRM team at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in as we don't have informaion about storage of potato.

messages.content: आलू की फसल को ठंड से बचाने के लिए मिट्टी का तापमान 10°C से ऊपर रखना चाहिए। यदि मिट्टी का तापमान 6°C या उससे कम हो जाता है, तो आलू की फसल को नुकसान हो सकता है। इसलिए, उचित तापमान बनाए रखने के लिए मल्चिंग, सिंचाई और अन्य उपायों का उपयोग करें।
हवा की नमी कितनी होनी चाहिए
messages.standalone_question: What should be the humidity level in the air?
messages.standalone_en: What should be the humidity level in the air?
messages.content_transliterated: hawa ki nami kitni honi chahiye

messages.content: आलू की फसल के लिए हवा की नमी (ह्यूमिडिटी) 60% से 80% के बीच होनी चाहिए। यह स्तर पौधों की वृद्धि और विकास के लिए अनुकूल होता है। यदि हवा की नमी बहुत कम (40% से नीचे) या बहुत अधिक (90% से ऊपर) हो जाती है, तो यह आलू की फसल के लिए हानिकारक हो सकता है। उचित हवा की नमी बनाए रखने से फसल की गुणवत्ता और उपज में सुधार होता है।
हवा की नमी को कैसे मेंटेन करें
messages.standalone_question: How can humidity in the air be maintained?
messages.standalone_en: How can humidity in the air be maintained?
messages.content_transliterated: hawa ki nami ko kaise maintain karen

messages.content:
हवा की नमी को बनाए रखने के लिए निम्नलिखित उपाय करें:

1. **सिंचाई**: नियमित रूप से सिंचाई करें, जिससे मिट्टी में नमी बनी रहे और वाष्पीकरण से हवा में नमी बढ़े।

2. **मल्चिंग**: मिट्टी की सतह पर मल्च (जैसे सूखी पत्तियाँ या स्ट्रॉ) डालें, जिससे मिट्टी की नमी बनी रहेगी और वाष्पीकरण कम होगा।

3. **फसल की विविधता**: फसल के बीच में अन्य पौधे लगाएं, जो नमी को बनाए रखने में मदद कर सकते हैं।

4. **पौधों की छाया**: बड़े पौधों या पेड़ों का उपयोग करें, जो छोटे पौधों को छाया प्रदान करें और वाष्पीकरण को कम करें।

5. **हवा का प्रवाह**: पौधों के बीच उचित दूरी बनाए रखें, जिससे हवा का प्रवाह बना रहे और नमी का संतुलन बना रहे।

इन उपायों से आप हवा की नमी को बनाए रख सकते हैं, जो आलू की फसल के लिए अनुकूल है।
हवा का दबाव कितना रखे
messages.standalone_question: What should be the air pressure?
messages.standalone_en: What should be the air pressure?

messages.content:
आलू की फसल के लिए हवा का दबाव सामान्यतः 1000 hPa (हेक्टोपास्कल) के आसपास होना चाहिए। यह स्तर पौधों की वृद्धि और विकास के लिए अनुकूल होता है। यदि हवा का दबाव बहुत कम या बहुत अधिक हो जाता है, तो यह आलू की फसल के लिए हानिकारक हो सकता है। 

सामान्यतः, मौसम की स्थिति के अनुसार हवा का दबाव बदलता रहता है, इसलिए इसे नियमित रूप से मॉनिटर करना महत्वपूर्ण है।
डिव्हिस बंद झाले आहे

faq:
Q: How do I start the Kairo device?
A: Press the switch below the top cap to start the device and wait until the parameters on the home screen are visible.

messages.content:
आपल्या Kairo डिव्हाइस चालू करण्यासाठी, खालील चरणांचे पालन करा:

1. **टॉप कॅपच्या खालील स्विचवर दाबा**.
2. डिव्हाइस सुरू झाल्यावर, होम स्क्रीनवर पॅरामीटर्स दिसेपर्यंत थांबा.

जर तुम्हाला अधिक मदतीची आवश्यकता असेल, तर कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
To turn on your Kairo device, follow the steps below:

1. **Press the switch below the top cap**.
2. When the device starts, wait until the parameters appear on the home screen.

If you need more help, please let me know!

faq:
Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

messages.content:
तुमच्या सेन्सरमध्ये काही समस्या असल्यास, कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **सेंसर कनेक्शन**: कनेक्शन तपासा, जर ते ढिले असतील तर त्यांना घट्ट करा.
2. **डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा**: डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करून अद्ययावत डेटा तपासा.
3. **सेंसरची स्थिती**: तपासा की सेंसर मातीमध्ये योग्यरित्या स्थापित आहे का. 

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्ही तांत्रिक सहाय्य तिकिट तयार करू इच्छिता का?
messages.en:
If there are any problems with your sensor, please check the following:

1. **Sensor connections**: Check the connections, if they are loose, tighten them.
2. **Restart the device**: Check the latest data by restarting the device.
3. **Position of the sensor**: Check that the sensor is properly installed in the soil. 

If you're still having a problem, would you like to create a technical assistance ticket?

messages.content:
आपण आपल्या प्लॉट्सवरील सेन्सरची स्थिती तपासू इच्छित असल्यास, कृपया थोडा वेळ द्या. मी आपल्या प्लॉट्ससाठी ताज्या सेन्सर डेटाची माहिती मिळवतो. 

कृपया थोडा वेळ थांबा.:

आपल्या प्लॉट्सवरील सेन्सर डेटा खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### Plot No 3 Sudhakar
- **तापमान:** 22.5°C
- **मातीची आर्द्रता 1:** 31 kPa (आर्द्र)
- **मातीची आर्द्रता 2:** 23 kPa (आर्द्र)
- **बॅटरी:** 69%
- **सेन्सर कार्यरत आहे.**

### Plot No 4 Sudhakar
- **तापमान:** 20.81°C
- **मातीची आर्द्रता 1:** 8 kPa (खूप आर्द्र)
- **मातीची आर्द्रता 2:** 13 kPa (आर्द्र)
- **बॅटरी:** 100%
- **सेन्सर कार्यरत आहे.**

आपले सेन्सर कार्यरत आहेत आणि मातीची आर्द्रता चांगली आहे. जर आपल्याला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असेल तर कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
If you would like to check the status of the sensors on your plots, please take some time. I get information on the latest sensor data for your plots. 

Please wait a while.:

The sensor data on your plots is as follows:

### Plot No 3 Sudhakar
- **Temperature:** 22.5°C
- **Soil moisture 1:** 31 kPa (moist)
- **Soil moisture 2:** 23 kPa (moist)
- **Battery:** 69%
- **The sensor is working.**

### Plot No 4 Sudhakar
- **Temperature:** 20.81°C
- **Soil moisture 1:** 8 kPa (very humid)
- **Soil moisture 2:** 13 kPa (moist)
- *Battery:** 100%
- **The sensor is working.**

Your sensors are working and the soil moisture is good. If you need any more information, please let me know!

messages.content: दाखवत नाही
messages.en: Not showing
messages.standalone_question: Why is it not displaying?
messages.standalone_en: Why is it not displaying?

messages.content:
जर आपला सेन्सर डेटा अद्ययावत होत नसेल, तर कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **डिव्हाइस कनेक्शन:** सुनिश्चित करा की डिव्हाइस अॅपशी जोडलेले आहे.
2. **नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी:** इंटरनेट कनेक्शन तपासा.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती:** बॅटरी चार्ज आहे का ते तपासा.
4. **डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा:** डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करून पहा.

जर या सर्व गोष्टी तपासल्यानंतरही समस्या कायम राहिली, तर कृपया Fyllo अॅपवर सपोर्ट तिकीट उघडा.
messages.en:
If your sensor data is not updated, please check the following:

1. **Device connection:** Make sure the device is connected to the app.
2. **Network connectivity:** Check internet connection.
3. **Battery status:** Check if the battery is charged.
4. **Restart the device:** Try restarting the device.

If the problem persists even after checking all of these things, please open the support ticket on the Fyllo app.

messages.content: मीटर रिडिंग दाखवत नाही
messages.standalone_question: The standalone question is: "The meter is not showing a reading."
messages.standalone_en: The standalone question is: "The meter is not showing a reading."

messages.content:
आपण कधी पाणी दिले होते? मीटर रिडिंग कमी होत नसल्यास, काही कारणे असू शकतात:

1. **पाणी योग्यरित्या पोहोचत नाही:** ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा असू शकतो, किंवा सेंद्रिय पाण्याच्या नळ्या किंवा ड्रिपरच्या अंतरामुळे पाणी सेंसरपर्यंत पोहोचत नसेल. कृपया ड्रिपर चांगले तपासा.

2. **सेंसर जुना आहे:** जर सेंसर दोन वर्षांपेक्षा जुना असेल, तर तो खराब होऊ शकतो. तुम्हाला तिकीट उघडायचे आहे का?

कृपया तपासा आणि मला सांगा.
काल

काल, 23 डिसेंबर 2024 रोजी, "जंबो 1" प्लॉटमध्ये कोणतीही पाऊसाची नोंद झाली नाही. सर्व तासांमध्ये पाऊस शून्य मिमी होता. 

जर तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असेल तर कृपया सांगा.
ॲप चेक करा
messages.standalone_question: Could you please check the app?
messages.standalone_en: Could you please check the app?

messages.content:
मी तुमच्या डिव्हाइसच्या स्थितीची तपासणी करू शकत नाही, परंतु तुम्ही तुमच्या Fyllo ॲपमध्ये खालीलप्रमाणे तपासू शकता:

1. Fyllo ॲप उघडा.
2. हॅम्बर्गर मेन्यू (≡) वर क्लिक करा.
3. खाली स्क्रोल करा, तुम्हाला Fyllo लोगो आणि ॲप आवृत्ती त्याखाली दिसेल.

जर तुमचा ॲप अद्ययावत नसेल, तर तुम्हाला Google Play Store किंवा Apple App Store वर जाऊन अद्यतन तपासावे लागेल. 

तुमच्या डिव्हाइसच्या कार्यक्षमतेसाठी, कृपया खात्री करा की डिव्हाइस चार्ज केलेले आहे आणि नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी चांगली आहे.
रिचार्ज केला आहे पण अपडेट दिसत नाही
