messages.content: ખુબ ભીનું કે ઓછુ રાખવુ
messages.en: Keep too wet or low
messages.standalone_question: How much should I keep it wet or dry?
messages.standalone_en: How much should I keep it wet or dry?

messages.content:
માટે, જમીનનું ભેજ સ્તર જોવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. જો જમીનનું ભેજ 0 kPa છે, તો તે ભીનું છે અને પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી. જો 200 kPa છે, તો તે સૂકું છે અને પાણી આપવું જોઈએ. 

તમે તમારા જમીનના ભેજના સ્તરને તપાસો અને તેના આધારે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે કે નહીં તે નક્કી કરો.
messages.en:
Therefore, it is important to look at the moisture level of the soil. If the soil moisture is 0 kPa, it is wet and does not need to be watered. If it is 200 kPa, it is dry and should be watered. 

You check the moisture level of your soil and decide whether you need to water based on it.

messages.content: ૧૧ હોય તો
messages.en: If it is 11
messages.standalone_question: If the moisture level is 11, what should I do?
messages.standalone_en: If the moisture level is 11, what should I do?

faq:
Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor values fluctuate?
A: Ensure the sensor is installed properly in the soil, check for air bubbles, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

Q: The moisture (kpa) is increasing slowly recently.
A: Need to check for current stage and evapotranspiration rate. If the crop is recently sown or pruning (छंटाई)  is done recently, the transpiration will be slow and moisture kpa will increase slowly. If evaporation is slow or temperature have dropped on rainfall has happened, it will increase slowly. The chatbot needs to check the temperature , rainfall and crop stage data. And advise if there is any reason for the slow increase.
If still there is some confusion, the chatbot needs to ask user to check moisture around the sensor by digging and then ask  the user if he wants to create an issue ticket for the same.

messages.content:
જો તમારા જમીનના ભેજનું સ્તર 11 kPa છે, તો તે "સૂકું" છે, પરંતુ હજુ પણ ભેજની શ્રેણીમાં છે. 

તમારા માટે યોગ્ય ભેજની શ્રેણી 2 kPa (ભીનું) થી 18 kPa (સૂકું) છે. 11 kPa પર, તમે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, પરંતુ જો તે 18 kPa ને પાર કરે છે, તો irrigation કરવું જોઈએ.
messages.en:
If the moisture level of your soil is 11 kPa, it is "dry", but still in the range of moisture. 

The suitable moisture range for you is 2 kPa (wet) to 18 kPa (dry). At 11 kPa, you don't need to water, but if it crosses 18 kPa, irrigation should be done.

messages.content: સોલર પેનલ કાલે જ સાફ કરી
messages.en: Cleaned the solar panel yesterday
messages.standalone_question: Did you clean the solar panels yesterday?

messages.content:
સોલર પેનલને સાફ કરવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે, જેથી તે યોગ્ય રીતે કાર્ય કરે. કાલે, એટલે કે 8 જાન્યુઆરી 2025, સોલર પેનલને સાફ કરવા માટે યાદ રાખો. 

સાફ કરવા માટે, ભેજવાળા કપડાથી ધૂળ અને મલિનતા દૂર કરો. જો જરૂર હોય, તો ઇનસેક્ટિસાઇડનો હળવો સ્પ્રે પણ કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
It is important to clean the solar panel so that it works properly. Remember tomorrow, i.e. 8th January 2025, to clean the solar panels. 

To clean, remove dust and dirt from a damp cloth. If needed, you can also do a mild spray of insecticide.

messages.content: અભિનંદન! તમે ગઈ કાલે સોલર પેનલને સાફ કરી દીધું છે. આ રીતે, તે વધુ સારી રીતે કાર્ય કરશે અને તમારી સિસ્ટમની કાર્યક્ષમતા વધારશે. જો તમને વધુ કોઈ મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો જણાવશો.

messages.content:
જો આજે ફરીથી સુચના આવી છે, તો તે શક્ય છે કે સોલર પેનલની કાર્યક્ષમતા માટે નિયમિત દેખરેખ અને જાળવણીની જરૂર છે. 

સોલર પેનલને નિયમિત રીતે સાફ કરવું અને તેની સ્થિતિની તપાસ કરવી મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે, જેથી તે વધુ સારી રીતે કાર્ય કરે. જો તમને વધુ માહિતી અથવા મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો જણાવશો.
messages.en:
If the notification has come again today, it is possible that the efficiency of the solar panels requires regular monitoring and maintenance. 

It is important to clean the solar panel regularly and check its condition so that it works better. If you need more information or help, let me know.

messages.content:
જો તમને ફરીથી સુચના મળી રહી છે, તો તે શક્ય છે કે સોલર પેનલમાં કોઈ ફોલ્ટ અથવા સમસ્યા હોઈ શકે છે. 

સોલર પેનલના કાર્યમાં કોઈ સમસ્યા હોય તો, તેને તપાસવા માટે નિષ્ણાતની મદદ લેવી શ્રેષ્ઠ રહેશે. તે પેનલની કાર્યક્ષમતા અને ઉત્પાદનને અસર કરી શકે છે. 

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી અથવા મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો જણાવશો.
messages.en:
If you are getting notifications again, it is possible that there could be a fault or problem in the solar panel. 

If there is a problem in the functioning of the solar panel, it would be best to take the help of an expert to check it. It can affect the efficiency and production of the panel. 

If you need more information or help, let me know.

messages.content: Cibrc su che
messages.en: Cibrc on that
messages.standalone_question: What is Cibrc?
messages.standalone_en: What is Cibrc?

messages.content:
CIBRC (Central Insecticide Board and Registration Committee) એ ભારત સરકારની એક સંસ્થા છે, જે કૃષિમાં ઉપયોગમાં લેવાતા કીટકનાશક અને અન્ય રાસાયણિક પદાર્થોની નોંધણી અને નિયમન માટે જવાબદાર છે. 

CIBRC કીટકનાશકના સત્યાપન, ગુણવત્તા અને સલામતીની ખાતરી કરે છે, જેથી ખેડૂતોને યોગ્ય અને સલામત ઉત્પાદનો ઉપલબ્ધ થાય. આ સંસ્થાનો ઉદ્દેશ્ય કૃષિમાં કીટકનાશકના ઉપયોગને નિયમિત કરવો અને ખેડૂતોને સુરક્ષિત અને અસરકારક ઉપાયો પ્રદાન કરવો છે. 

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ છે, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો.
messages.en:
The Central Insecticide Board and Registration Committee is an organization of the Government of India responsible for the registration and regulation of pesticides and other chemicals used in agriculture. 

THE CIBRC ensures the verification, quality and safety of the pesticide, so that proper and safe products are available to the farmers. The aim of this institute is to regulate the use of pesticides in agriculture and provide safe and effective solutions to farmers. 

If you would like more information, please let me know.

हवामान बद झाले आहे अपडेट केल्या वर  कारनं सांगा

messages.content:
आजच्या हवामानात कोणतीही पाऊस नाही. 29 जुलै 2025 पासून 30 जुलै 2025 पर्यंतच्या तासांमध्ये पाऊस झाला नाही. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी हवामान स्थिर आहे. काही बदल असल्यास, कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
There is no rain in today's weather. There was no rain in the hours from July 29, 2025 to July 30, 2025. 

The weather is stable for your plot. If there are any changes, please let me know.

messages.content: डिव्हाईस मध्ये हवामान ऑप चालु होते अपडेट केल्या वर बंद का झाले
messages.en: The device was running the weather op and why it was turned off when updated
messages.standalone_question: Why did the weather feature in the device turn off after the update?
messages.standalone_en: Why did the weather feature in the device turn off after the update?
messages.content_transliterated: device madhye havaman op chalu hote update kelya var band ka jhale

messages.content:
जर तुमच्या डिव्हाईसमध्ये हवामान ऑपरेशन चालू होते आणि नंतर बंद झाले असेल, तर काही कारणे असू शकतात:

1. **संपर्क समस्या**: डिव्हाईसच्या कनेक्शनची तपासणी करा. कनेक्शन ढिले असल्यास, ते घट्ट करा.
2. **नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी**: इंटरनेट कनेक्शन तपासा. नेटवर्कमध्ये काही समस्या असल्यास, डिव्हाईस डेटा अपडेट करू शकत नाही.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती**: बॅटरीची स्थिती तपासा. कमी बॅटरीमुळे डिव्हाईस कार्य करणे थांबवू शकते.
4. **डिव्हाईस रीस्टार्ट करा**: डिव्हाईस रीस्टार्ट करून पाहा. कधी कधी, साधा रीस्टार्ट समस्या सोडवू शकतो.

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर कृपया अधिक माहिती द्या, मी तुम्हाला मदत करेन.
messages.en:
If your device had a weather operation on and then turned off, there may be a few reasons:

1. **Contact problem**: Check the device's connection. If the connection is loose, tighten it.
2. **Network connectivity**: Check internet connection. If there is a problem with the network, the device cannot update the data.
3. **Battery status**: Check battery position. A low battery can stop the device from working.
4. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart. Sometimes, a simple restart can solve the problem.

If you're still having a problem, please provide more information, I'll help you.

messages.content: डिव्हाईस दुसरे बदलून नवीन टाकले आहे तरी पण दाखवत नाहीये
messages.en: The device has been replaced with a new one, but it is not showing
messages.standalone_question: Why is the device not displaying information even after replacing it with a new one?
messages.standalone_en: Why is the device not displaying information even after replacing it with a new one?
messages.content_transliterated: device dusare badalun navin takale aahe tari pan dakhavat nahiye

messages.content:
जर तुम्ही नवीन डिव्हाईस स्थापित केले आहे आणि ते अद्याप डेटा दाखवत नाही, तर खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **कनेक्शन तपासा**: नवीन डिव्हाईस योग्यरित्या कनेक्ट केले आहे का ते तपासा.
2. **नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी**: डिव्हाईस इंटरनेटशी कनेक्ट आहे का ते तपासा.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती**: डिव्हाईसची बॅटरी चांगली आहे का ते तपासा.
4. **डिव्हाईस रीस्टार्ट करा**: नवीन डिव्हाईस रीस्टार्ट करून पाहा.
5. **अॅप अपडेट**: तुमच्या अॅपला नवीनतम आवृत्तीत अपडेट केले आहे का ते तपासा.

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर मी तुम्हाला सपोर्ट तिकिट उघडण्यात मदत करू शकतो. तुम्हाला तिकिट उघडायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
If you've installed a new device and it still doesn't show the data, check the following:

1. **Check connection**: Check that the new device is properly connected.
2. **Network Connectivity**: Check if the device is connected to the Internet.
3. **Battery status**: Check if the device's battery is good.
4. **Restart the device**: Try a new device restart.
5. **App Update**: Check that your app has been updated to the latest version.

If you're still having a problem, I can help you open the support ticket. Do you want to open a ticket?

messages.content: तिकीट काय आहे
messages.en: What's the ticket?
messages.standalone_question: What is a support ticket?
messages.standalone_en: What is a support ticket?

tools:
raise_support_ticket  
Raises a support ticket for the given plot. Dharti decides the priority and message based on the conversation.

messages.content:
तिकीट म्हणजे एक प्रकारची विनंती किंवा समस्या नोंदवण्याची प्रक्रिया आहे, ज्याद्वारे तुम्ही तांत्रिक सहाय्य किंवा सेवा मागू शकता. हे सहसा ग्राहक सेवा टीमकडे पाठवले जाते, जे तुमच्या समस्येवर लक्ष देऊन त्याचे निराकरण करण्याचा प्रयत्न करतात.

उदाहरणार्थ, जर तुमच्या डिव्हाईसमध्ये काही समस्या असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडून त्या समस्येची माहिती देऊ शकता. यामुळे तांत्रिक टीम तुमच्या समस्येवर काम करू शकते.

तुम्हाला तिकिट उघडायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
Ticketing is a type of request or problem reporting process, through which you can ask for technical assistance or services. This is usually referred to the customer service team, who try to address and solve your problem.

For example, if there is a problem with your device, you can open the ticket and report the problem. This allows the technical team to work on your problem.

Do you want to open a ticket?

1. **तुमच्या प्लॉटचे नाव**: "plot no. 1 (manik chaman)"

3. **तुमचा संदेश**: "कृपया तांत्रिक सहाय्य पाठवा."

messages.en:
Please give me some information to open tickets for your plot:

1. **Name of your plot**: "Plot No. 1 (manik chaman)"
2. **Problem**: "The new device doesn't work."
3. **Your message**: "Please send technical assistance."

If you'd like to make any changes, please let me know. Otherwise, I'll open the ticket.

messages.content: पहिले चालु होते uninstall केल्या वर बंद झाले
messages.en: First started uninstalled and closed
messages.standalone_question: The device was working fine before, but it stopped after I uninstalled it. What should I do?
messages.standalone_en: The device was working fine before, but it stopped after I uninstalled it. What should I do?

messages.content:
तुम्ही डिव्हाईस अनइंस्टॉल केल्यानंतर ते चालू होत नाही का? कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **डिव्हाईस कनेक्शन**: डिव्हाईस योग्यरित्या कनेक्ट केले आहे का?
2. **नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी**: तुमच्या इंटरनेट कनेक्शनची स्थिती तपासा.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती**: डिव्हाईसची बॅटरी चांगली आहे का?
4. **रीस्टार्ट**: डिव्हाईस रीस्टार्ट करून पाहा.

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्हाला सपोर्ट टीमसाठी तिकीट तयार करायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
Doesn't it turn on after you uninstall the device? Please check the following:

1. **Device Connection**: Is the device connected correctly?
2. **Network Connectivity**: Check the status of your internet connection.
3. **Battery status**: Is the device's battery good?
4. **Restart**: Try the device restart.

If you're still having a problem, do you want to prepare a ticket for the support team?

messages.content: ढगाळ वातावरणामध्ये १७ते २०तास बंद राहते
messages.en: It is closed for 17 to 20 hours in cloudy conditions.
messages.standalone_question: Does the device remain inactive for 17 to 20 hours in cloudy weather?
messages.standalone_en: Does the device remain inactive for 17 to 20 hours in cloudy weather?
messages.content_transliterated: dhagal vatavaranamadhye ate etas band rahate

messages.content:
ढगाळ वातावरणामुळे डिव्हाईसच्या कार्यक्षमतेवर परिणाम होऊ शकतो. जर तुम्ही १७ ते २० तासांमध्ये डिव्हाईस चालू केले असेल आणि ते अद्याप कार्यरत नसेल, तर तुम्हाला खालील गोष्टी तपासण्याची आवश्यकता आहे:

1. **डिव्हाईस रीस्टार्ट करा**: डिव्हाईस रीस्टार्ट करून पाहा.
2. **कनेक्शन तपासा**: डिव्हाईस योग्यरित्या कनेक्ट केले आहे का ते तपासा.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती**: बॅटरी चांगली आहे का ते तपासा.

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्हाला सपोर्ट टीमसाठी तिकीट तयार करायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
Cloudy weather can affect the performance of the device. If you turn on the device in 17 to 20 hours and it's not yet working, you need to check the following:

1. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart.
2. **Check connection**: Check if the device is properly connected.
3. **Battery status**: Check if the battery is good.

If you're still having a problem, do you want to prepare a ticket for the support team?

messages.content:
तुमच्या प्लॉटच्या सिंचन सेटिंग्जनुसार, सिंचनासाठी लागणारे गणित केलेले तास 0.17 तास आहेत.

मी खालील सेटिंग्ज वापरल्या:
- रूट रुंदी: 8 इंच
- रूट खोली: 6 इंच
- मातीची धारणा: 180 मिमी
- ड्रिपर अंतर: 1.15 मिमी
- ड्रिपर डिस्चार्ज: 4 लिटर

तुम्हाला दुसऱ्या सेटिंग्जसह सिंचन तासांची गणना करायची आहे का? जर होय, तर कृपया नवीन मूल्ये द्या.
messages.en:
Depending on the irrigation settings of your plot, the calculated hours required for irrigation are 0.17 hours.

I used the following settings:
- Route width: 8 inches
- Root depth: 6 inches
- Soil retention: 180 mm
- Dripper distance: 1.15 mm
- Dripper discharge: 4 liters

Do you want to count irrigation hours with other settings? If yes, please give new values.

messages.content:
आपका फसल का सक्रिय चरण "प्रारंभिक पौधों की वृद्धि" है। मैं आपके लिए खाद की फर्टिगेशन अनुसूची की जानकारी प्राप्त कर रहा हूँ। कृपया एक क्षण प्रतीक्षा करें।:

आपकी फसल "केला" की वर्तमान सक्रिय चरण "प्रारंभिक पौधों की वृद्धि" है, जो 13 जुलाई 2025 से शुरू हुई है। इस समय आप सप्ताह 2 में हैं। 

### वर्तमान फर्टिगेशन अनुसूची (सप्ताह 2):
1. **फर्टिगेशन विधि**:
   - **फर्टिलाइज़र**: 
     - 12-61-0: 6 किलोग्राम/पौधा
     - यूरिया: 9.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा
     - कैल्शियम नाइट्रेट: 6 किलोग्राम/पौधा
   - **नोट**: फास्फोरिक एसिड को अन्य खादों के आवेदन से 15-20 मिनट पहले अलग से लगाना चाहिए।

### अगली फर्टिगेशन अनुसूची (सप्ताह 3):
- **तारीख**: 28 सितंबर 2025 से शुरू होगी।
- **फर्टिगेशन विधि**:
   - **फर्टिलाइज़र**: 
     - पोटेशियम नाइट्रेट: 16 किलोग्राम/पौधा
     - यूरिया: 6.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा
     - मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट: 7.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा

आपको इन खादों का सही समय पर उपयोग करना चाहिए। यदि आपको और जानकारी चाहिए, तो बताएं!
messages.en:
The active phase of your harvest is the "early plant growth." I am getting information about the fertigation schedule of manure for you. Please wait a moment. :

The current active phase of your crop "Banana" is "Early Plant Growth", which has started on 13 July 2025. You are currently in week 2. 

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
1. **Fertigation Method**:
   - **Fertilizer**: 
     - 12-61-0: 6 Kg/Plant
     - Urea: 9.5 kg/plant
     - Calcium nitrate: 6 kg/plant
   - **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 3):
- **Date**: Starting 28th September 2025.
- **Fertigation Method**:
   - **Fertilizer**: 
     - Potassium nitrate: 16 kg/plant
     - Urea: 6.5 kg/plant
     - Magnesium sulfate: 7.5 kg/plant

You should use these fertilizers at the right time. If you need more information, let me know!

### वर्तमान फर्टिगेशन अनुसूची (सप्ताह 2):
- **फर्टिलाइज़र**:
  - 12-61-0: 6 किलोग्राम/पौधा
  - यूरिया: 9.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा
  - कैल्शियम नाइट्रेट: 6 किलोग्राम/पौधा
- **नोट**: फास्फोरिक एसिड को अन्य खादों के आवेदन से 15-20 मिनट पहले अलग से लगाना चाहिए।

### अगली फर्टिगेशन अनुसूची (सप्ताह 3):
- **तारीख**: 28 सितंबर 2025 से शुरू होगी।
- **फर्टिलाइज़र**:
  - पोटेशियम नाइट्रेट: 16 किलोग्राम/पौधा
  - यूरिया: 6.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा
  - मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट: 7.5 किलोग्राम/पौधा

आपको इन खादों का सही समय पर उपयोग करना चाहिए। 

### नोटिफिकेशन सेट करने के लिए:
आप अपने कैलेंडर में निम्नलिखित नोटिफिकेशन सेट कर सकते हैं:
- **28 सितंबर 2025**: अगली फर्टिगेशन के लिए खाद का आवेदन।

यदि आपको और जानकारी चाहिए या कोई और सहायता चाहिए, तो बताएं!
messages.en:
The current active phase of your crop "banana" is "early plant growth", and you are in week 2. 

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 2):
- **Fertilizer**:
  - 12-61-0: 6 Kg/Plant
  - Urea: 9.5 kg/plant
  - Calcium nitrate: 6 kg/plant
- **Note**: Phosphoric acid should be applied separately 15-20 minutes before the application of other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 3):
- **Date**: Starting 28th September 2025.
- **Fertilizer**:
  - Potassium nitrate: 16 kg/plant
  - Urea: 6.5 kg/plant
  - Magnesium sulfate: 7.5 kg/plant

You should use these fertilizers at the right time. 

### To set up notifications:
You can set the following notifications in your calendar:
- **28 September 2025**: Application of manure for the next fertigation.

If you need more information or any more help, let us know!

messages.content: फर्टिगेशन का नोटिफिकेशन चाहिए

messages.standalone_question: I need a notification for the fertigation schedule.
messages.standalone_en: I need a notification for the fertigation schedule.

tools:
get_fertigation_schedule  
Checks the farmer's crop stages and requirements with internal petiole reports and gives the current week fertigation schedule details, and details of the next fertigation schedule (could be next week in the same crop stage or in next crop stage) for the plots. Fertilizers are given by 3 distribution methods:  
- Fertigation: fertilizers put into the irrigation pipeline itself  
- Foliar: on the leaves using a foliar spray  
- Soil: directly on the soil  
If the unit of fertilizer amount includes "per acre", then it is for 1 acre. Otherwise it is for "units per 1 plant".

get_specific_fertigation_requirements  
Finds the fertigation requirements for the plots with a particular crop stage and week numbers.
faq:
Q: Where can I find the fertigation schedule in the Fyllo app?
A: To access the fertigation schedule:
    1. Open the Fyllo app
    2. Select "My Farm" at the bottom
    3. Tap on the "Fertigation" option
   You'll find the fertigation schedule there, including details about the required fertilizer applications.

Q: Does Fyllo provide a fertigation schedule?
A: Yes, Fyllo provides a fertigation schedule for users.

Q: What should I do if I can't find the fertigation schedule after selecting the fertigation tab?
A: If you don't see the fertigation schedule, you'll need to create a report first. Would you like assistance in creating a report? Do you have any soil, leaf, or petiole test data available? If not, we can generate a basic schedule for you using general crop and regional data.

Q: How do I generate a fertigation schedule in the app?
A: To generate a fertigation schedule, follow these steps:

    1. Go to "My Farm"
    2. Select "Fertigation"
    3. Tap "Create Report"
    4. Fill in all the required details
    5. Save the report
    If you have soil, leaf, or petiole test data, you can input this for a more customized schedule. Otherwise, we can generate a basic schedule using general crop and regional data.

Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

tools:
get_fertigation_schedule  
Checks the farmer's crop stages and requirements with internal petiole reports and gives the current week fertigation schedule details, and details of the next fertigation schedule (could be next week in the same crop stage or in next crop stage) for the plots. Fertilizers are given by 3 distribution methods:  
- Fertigation: fertilizers put into the irrigation pipeline itself  
- Foliar: on the leaves using a foliar spray  
- Soil: directly on the soil  
If the unit of fertilizer amount includes "per acre", then it is for 1 acre. Otherwise it is for "units per 1 plant".

get_specific_fertigation_requirements  
Finds the fertigation requirements for the plots with a particular crop stage and week numbers.
faq:
Q: What should I do if I can't find the fertigation schedule after selecting the fertigation tab?
A: If you don't see the fertigation schedule, you'll need to create a report first. Would you like assistance in creating a report? Do you have any soil, leaf, or petiole test data available? If not, we can generate a basic schedule for you using general crop and regional data.

Q: If I don't add any test data, what is the basis for the generated fertigation schedule?
A: When no specific test data is provided, Fyllo generates a basic fertigation schedule based on:

    1. Typical nutrient needs for your crop type
    2. General soil characteristics common in your region
    3. Standard growing practices for your area
    This schedule provides a starting point, but may not be as precise as one based on specific test data.

Q: Can I generate a fertigation schedule without soil, leaf, or petiole data?
A: Yes, you can generate a basic fertigation schedule without specific soil, leaf, or petiole data. Fyllo will create a general schedule based on typical crop needs and soil types for your region.

Q: Does Fyllo provide a fertigation schedule?
A: Yes, Fyllo provides a fertigation schedule for users.

Q: Where can I find the fertigation schedule in the Fyllo app?
A: To access the fertigation schedule:
    1. Open the Fyllo app
    2. Select "My Farm" at the bottom
    3. Tap on the "Fertigation" option
   You'll find the fertigation schedule there, including details about the required fertilizer applications.

tools:
get_fertigation_schedule  
Checks the farmer's crop stages and requirements with internal petiole reports and gives the current week fertigation schedule details, and details of the next fertigation schedule (could be next week in the same crop stage or in next crop stage) for the plots. Fertilizers are given by 3 distribution methods:  
- Fertigation: fertilizers put into the irrigation pipeline itself  
- Foliar: on the leaves using a foliar spray  
- Soil: directly on the soil  
If the unit of fertilizer amount includes "per acre", then it is for 1 acre. Otherwise it is for "units per 1 plant".

get_specific_fertigation_requirements  
Finds the fertigation requirements for the plots with a particular crop stage and week numbers.
faq:
Q: Can I generate a fertigation schedule without soil, leaf, or petiole data?
A: Yes, you can generate a basic fertigation schedule without specific soil, leaf, or petiole data. Fyllo will create a general schedule based on typical crop needs and soil types for your region.

Q: If I don't add any test data, what is the basis for the generated fertigation schedule?
A: When no specific test data is provided, Fyllo generates a basic fertigation schedule based on:

    1. Typical nutrient needs for your crop type
    2. General soil characteristics common in your region
    3. Standard growing practices for your area
    This schedule provides a starting point, but may not be as precise as one based on specific test data.

Q: What should I do if I can't find the fertigation schedule after selecting the fertigation tab?
A: If you don't see the fertigation schedule, you'll need to create a report first. Would you like assistance in creating a report? Do you have any soil, leaf, or petiole test data available? If not, we can generate a basic schedule for you using general crop and regional data.

Q: How do I generate a fertigation schedule in the app?
A: To generate a fertigation schedule, follow these steps:

    1. Go to "My Farm"
    2. Select "Fertigation"
    3. Tap "Create Report"
    4. Fill in all the required details
    5. Save the report
    If you have soil, leaf, or petiole test data, you can input this for a more customized schedule. Otherwise, we can generate a basic schedule using general crop and regional data.

Q: Does Fyllo provide a fertigation schedule?
A: Yes, Fyllo provides a fertigation schedule for users.

If the problem persists, please contact technical assistance.

messages.content: Ha क्रमांक सांभाळून ठेवावा लागेल.का
messages.en: The number Ha has to be maintained.
messages.standalone_question: Do I need to keep track of the ticket number?
messages.standalone_en: Do I need to keep track of the ticket number?

messages.content:
होय, तिकीट क्रमांक सांभाळून ठेवणे महत्त्वाचे आहे कारण:

1. **संपर्क साधण्यासाठी**: तुम्हाला तांत्रिक टीमशी संपर्क साधताना तिकीट क्रमांक आवश्यक असेल.
2. **स्थिती तपासण्यासाठी**: तुम्ही तिकीटाची स्थिती किंवा प्रगती तपासू शकता.
3. **सहाय्याची मागणी**: जर तुम्हाला पुन्हा मदतीची आवश्यकता असेल, तर तिकीट क्रमांक वापरून तुम्ही जलद सेवा मिळवू शकता.

कृपया तिकीट क्रमांक लक्षात ठेवा.
messages.en:
Yes, it is important to maintain the ticket number because:

1. **To contact**: You will need a ticket number when contacting the technical team.
2. **To check status**: You can check the status or progress of the ticket.
3. **Request for help**: If you need help again, you can get faster service using the ticket number.

Please remember the ticket number.

messages.standalone_en: Why is the second layer still dry despite the heavy rainfall?

messages.content:
तुमच्या "guava" प्लॉटमध्ये 2रा थर (moisture2) 97% आढळला आहे, म्हणजेच तो कोरडा नाही. पाऊस झाल्यानंतर, पाण्याची पातळी कमी होण्यास वेळ लागतो. 

जर तुम्हाला वाटत असेल की पाण्याचा पुरवठा योग्य प्रकारे होत नाही, तर तुम्ही खालील गोष्टी तपासू शकता:

1. **ड्रिप सिस्टीम**: ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये कोणतीही अडथळा आहे का? 
2. **सेंसरची स्थिती**: सेंसर योग्य ठिकाणी आहे का? 
3. **पाण्याचा प्रवाह**: पाण्याचा प्रवाह योग्य आहे का?

जर तुम्हाला अजून काही शंका असतील, तर तुम्ही सेंसरच्या आजूबाजूला माती खोदून तपासू शकता. तुम्हाला या समस्येसाठी तिकीट उघडायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
In your "guava" plot, the 2nd layer (moisture2) has been found 97%, meaning it is not dry. After rain, it takes time for the water level to drop. 

If you think the water supply isn't going well, you can check the following:

1. **Drip System**: Is there a barrier to the drip system? 
2. **Position of the sensor**: Is the sensor in the right place? 
3. **Water flow**: Is the flow of water right?

If you have any more doubts, you can dig the soil around the sensor and check. Do you want to open a ticket for this issue?

messages.en:
You can check the following for problems with your device:

1. **Device connection**: Check that the device is properly connected.
2. **Network connectivity**: Check the internet connection, as it cannot update the data.
3. **Battery status**: Check if the battery is charged.
4. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart.

If all these things don't solve the problem, you may need technical assistance. Do you want to open a ticket?

जर या सर्व गोष्टी तपासूनही समस्या सुटली नाही, तर तुम्हाला तांत्रिक सहाय्याची आवश्यकता असू शकते. तुम्हाला तिकिट उघडायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
If the updated data is not visible even if you restart the device twice, you may need to check for the following:

1. **Device connection**: Is the device properly connected to the app?
2. **Network Connectivity**: Check the status of your internet connection.
3. **Battery status**: Check if the battery is charged.
4. **Device Settings**: Check if there has been any change in the settings of the device.

If all these things don't solve the problem, you may need technical assistance. Do you want to open a ticket?

faq:
Q: How do I contact customer support for Fyllo?
A: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in. Do you want me to raise a support ticket for you?

Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.
 - Agronomical Algorithms created by a team of scientists led by Dr. Shikhamany, who is considered by many as the father of Indian grape industry.
 - 100% customer retention: Fyllo is known for its service on the ground, 24-hour issue resolution.
 - User-friendly interface that's easy to understand for all language and age group users.

Q: My Kairo/Nero device is not working.
A: If some issue is being faced, user can raise the support ticket in the Fyllo app. If the issue is not solved please contact Fyllo customer support for further assistance. Do you want me to raise the support ticket for you?

Q: How can I reset or restart the Fyllo crop stage on the app?
A: For Hindi instructions, please watch this video: [फसल की स्टेज कैसे अपडेट करे ?](https://youtu.be/Gx2XUOGqNoA) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/Gx2XUOGqNoA/mqdefault.jpg). For English instructions, please watch this video: [How to update crop stages in App?](https://youtu.be/knCXf0vdN7k) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/knCXf0vdN7k/mqdefault.jpg). For additional info, contact the CRM team: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in.
Make sure to give both hindi and english links.

Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

messages.content: तुमचा 2no चा सेन्सर खूप कोरडे का धावतोय
messages.en: Why does your 2no's sensor run too dry?
messages.standalone_question: Why is your second sensor running very dry?
messages.standalone_en: Why is your second sensor running very dry?

faq:
Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is showing dry.
A: Ask user when he irrigated. It usually takes 12 hours to reach the water till sensor. If the sensor is not dropping even after 12 hours, it can be due to one of the following reasons :
Water is not reaching properly till the sensor , this can be due to drip blocked , or slope in the land or dripper outlets far away from the sensor. Ask user to check if drip is fine and  dripper is within the range of sensor. 
The sensor can be very old , more than two years , in this case , the sensor might be malfunction, ask user if he wants to raise a ticket

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is dropping slowly.
A: Sometimes, the water reaches slowly till root zone and the moisture sensor kPa value drops slowly. Always wait for 12 hours after irrigation for the moisture to saturate. If still some confusion, ask user to check moisture near the sensor and check if he wants to raise a ticket for the issue.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

messages.content_transliterated: tumcha 2no cha sensor khoop korde ka dhavatoy

messages.content:
आपल्या प्लॉटमध्ये 2no चा सेन्सर खूप कोरडे धावतोय, याचे काही कारणे असू शकतात:

1. **पाण्याची पोहोच**: तपासा की पाण्याची पोहोच सेन्सरपर्यंत होत आहे का. ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा आहे का? 
2. **सेन्सरची स्थिती**: सेन्सर जुना आहे का? 2 वर्षांपेक्षा जुना असल्यास, तो खराब झाला असू शकतो.
3. **जमिनीची स्थिती**: जमिनीच्या ढाल किंवा ड्रिप आउटलेट्सची स्थिती तपासा. सेन्सरच्या जवळ ड्रिप आउटलेट्स आहेत का?

आपण हे सर्व तपासून पाहू शकता. जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर आपण तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता.
messages.en:
There may be a few reasons why the 2no sensor is running very dry in your plot:

1. **Water access**: Check if water is reaching the sensor. Is there a barrier to the drip system? 
2. **The state of the sensor**: Is the sensor old? If older than 2 years, it may have been damaged.
3. **Soil condition**: Check the position of soil shields or drip outlets. Are there drip outlets near the sensor?

You can check it all out. If the problem persists, you may want to consider opening a ticket.

messages.en: It rains for two days simultaneously, 1 no cha works fine, 2no cha very dry
messages.standalone_question: Why is the 2nd sensor showing very dry conditions even though it has been raining for two consecutive days and the 1st sensor is functioning properly?
messages.standalone_en: Why is the 2nd sensor showing very dry conditions even though it has been raining for two consecutive days and the 1st sensor is functioning properly?

faq:
Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: I irrigated still the sensor is showing dry.
A: Ask user when he irrigated. It usually takes 12 hours to reach the water till sensor. If the sensor is not dropping even after 12 hours, it can be due to one of the following reasons :
Water is not reaching properly till the sensor , this can be due to drip blocked , or slope in the land or dripper outlets far away from the sensor. Ask user to check if drip is fine and  dripper is within the range of sensor. 
The sensor can be very old , more than two years , in this case , the sensor might be malfunction, ask user if he wants to raise a ticket

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

Q: My  sensor is showing 0 Kpa for long.
A: 0-5 kPa means wet soil. It can be due to following :
If the device is recently installed, there can be moisture  around the sensor because the sensor is dipped in the water before installing. If this is the case, ask them to do atleast 3 irrigations as per their previous schedule without sensors and sensors would b set by then.
If the crop stage is very early or pruing is done recently, the water takeup by plants is negligible in this period because of very less transpiration. If this is the case, ask them to wait till irrigation Kpa in the present stage.
Sometimes, the water can remain accumulated around the sensor due to local landscaping or slope in the land around sensor. In this case, please check the around the sensor. It will have to be reinstalled properly. Chatbot should ask the user if he wants to create an issue ticket for the same

messages.content:
जर 2no चा सेन्सर खूप कोरडे दाखवत असेल, तर याचे काही कारणे असू शकतात:

1. **पाण्याची पोहोच**: पाऊस झाल्यानंतरही, पाण्याची पोहोच सेन्सरपर्यंत होत आहे का हे तपासा. पाण्याचा प्रवाह अडथळित झाला आहे का?
2. **जमिनीची स्थिती**: पाऊस झाल्यानंतर, जमिनीच्या ढाल किंवा ड्रिप आउटलेट्सची स्थिती तपासा. सेन्सरच्या जवळ ड्रिप आउटलेट्स आहेत का?
3. **सेन्सरची स्थिती**: सेन्सर जुना आहे का? 2 वर्षांपेक्षा जुना असल्यास, तो खराब झाला असू शकतो.

आपण हे सर्व तपासून पाहू शकता. जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर आपण तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता.
messages.en:
If 2no's sensor shows too dry, there may be a few reasons for this:

1. **Water access**: Even after rain, check that water is reaching the sensor. Has the flow of water been blocked?
2. **Soil condition**: After rain, check the condition of soil shields or drip outlets. Are there drip outlets near the sensor?
3. **The state of the sensor**: Is the sensor old? If older than 2 years, it may have been damaged.

You can check it all out. If the problem persists, you may want to consider opening a ticket.

messages.content: 6महिन्या पूर्वी इश्टोल केला आहे
messages.en: Issued 6 months ago
messages.standalone_question: When was the sensor installed?
messages.standalone_en: When was the sensor installed?

messages.content:
जर 2no चा सेन्सर 200 kPa दर्शवत असेल आणि तुम्ही 6 महिन्यांपूर्वी इश्टोल केला असेल, तर याचा अर्थ सेन्सर खराब झाला असू शकतो. 200 kPa म्हणजे माती पूर्णपणे कोरडी आहे किंवा सेन्सर योग्यरित्या कार्य करत नाही.

तुम्हाला हे तपासण्याची आवश्यकता आहे:
1. **सेन्सरची स्थिती**: सेन्सरची कनेक्शन तपासा, कनेक्शन ढिले असल्यास ते घट्ट करा.
2. **पाण्याची पोहोच**: ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा आहे का ते तपासा. 
3. **फिजिकल चेक**: सेन्सर मातीच्या बाहेर आहे का ते तपासा.

जर तुम्हाला समस्या कायम राहिली, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता.
messages.en:
If the 2no sensor shows 200 kPa and you issued it 6 months ago, this could mean the sensor may have malfunctioned. 200 kPa means the soil is completely dry or the sensor is not working properly.

You need to check this:
1. **Position of the sensor**: Check the connection of the sensor, tighten it if the connection is loose.
2. **Water access**: Check if there is a bottleneck in the drip system. 
3. **Physical check**: Check if the sensor is out of the soil.

If you continue to have problems, you may want to consider opening a ticket.

messages.standalone_question: Is there sufficient moisture in the soil?
messages.standalone_en: Is there sufficient moisture in the soil?

faq:
Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.
A: The sensor measures the moisture around the rootzone which is not visible from the top. Ask use to check the moisture in rootzone around the sensor. If it matches, ask the user to irrigate.

Q: Sensor is showing dry, but it rained recently.
A: Rainwater doesn't percolate well in the soil. Most of it runs off. After a day of rain stops , if the sensor is still dry, you will have to irrigate. You can check the moisture by digging near the sensor . Irrigate accordingly.

messages.content:
जर जमिनीत पुरेसा ओलावा आहे, पण 2no चा सेन्सर कोरडे दाखवत असेल, तर याचा अर्थ सेन्सर योग्यरित्या कार्य करत नाही. 

तुम्ही खालील गोष्टी तपासू शकता:
1. **सेन्सरची स्थिती**: सेन्सरची कनेक्शन तपासा, कनेक्शन ढिले असल्यास ते घट्ट करा.
2. **फिजिकल चेक**: सेन्सर मातीच्या बाहेर आहे का ते तपासा.
3. **पाण्याची पोहोच**: ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा आहे का ते तपासा.

जर तुम्हाला समस्या कायम राहिली, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता.
messages.en:
If there's enough moisture in the soil, but a 2no sensor shows dryness, it means the sensor isn't working properly. 

You can check the following:
1. **Position of the sensor**: Check the connection of the sensor, tighten it if the connection is loose.
2. **Physical check**: Check if the sensor is out of the soil.
3. **Water access**: Check if there is a bottleneck in the drip system.

If you continue to have problems, you may want to consider opening a ticket.

messages.content: कनेक्शन चेक ती एरियल का
messages.en: Check the connection of Ariel.
messages.standalone_question: Is the connection check for the aerial?
messages.standalone_en: Is the connection check for the aerial?

messages.content:
जर तुम्हाला कनेक्शन चेक करायचे असेल, तर तुम्ही खालील गोष्टी तपासू शकता:

1. **एरियल कनेक्शन**: एरियल कनेक्शन चांगले आहे का ते तपासा. कनेक्शन ढिले असल्यास, ते घट्ट करा.
2. **सिग्नल स्ट्रेंथ**: एरियलच्या सिग्नल स्ट्रेंथची तपासणी करा. कमी सिग्नल असल्यास, एरियलची स्थिती बदलण्याचा विचार करा.
3. **डिव्हाइस रिस्टार्ट**: डिव्हाइस रिस्टार्ट करून पाहा, कधी कधी हे कनेक्शन समस्यांचे निराकरण करते.

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता.
messages.en:
If you want to check the connection, you can check the following:

1. **Aerial Connection**: Check if the aerial connection is good. If the connection is loose, tighten it.
2. **Signal Strength**: Check Ariel's signal strength. If there is a low signal, consider changing the position of the aerial.
3. **Device Restart**: Try device restart, sometimes it solves connection issues.

If you're still having problems, you may want to consider opening tickets.

messages.content: डेव्हिस रिस्टार्ट कसे करायचे
messages.en: How to restart Davis
messages.standalone_question: How do I restart the device?
messages.standalone_en: How do I restart the device?

messages.content:
डिव्हाइस रिस्टार्ट करण्यासाठी, तुम्ही खालील पायऱ्या अनुसरण करू शकता:

1. **पावर बटण शोधा**: डिव्हाइसच्या खालील भागात पावर बटण असेल.
2. **पावर बटण दाबा**: पावर बटण दाबा आणि थोडा वेळ धरून ठेवा.
3. **डिव्हाइस बंद करा**: डिव्हाइस बंद झाल्यावर, पुन्हा पावर बटण दाबा.
4. **पुनः सुरू होईपर्यंत थांबा**: डिव्हाइस सुरू होईपर्यंत थांबा आणि होम स्क्रीनवरील पॅरामीटर्स दिसेपर्यंत वाट पहा.

यामुळे तुमचा डिव्हाइस रिस्टार्ट होईल. जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता.
messages.en:
To restart the device, you can follow the following steps:

1. **Find a power button**: There will be a power button in the lower part of the device.
2. *** Press the power button**: Press the power button and hold it for a while.
3. **Turn off the device**: After the device is turned off, press the power button again.
4. **Wait until the device starts again**: Wait until the device starts and wait until the parameters on the home screen appear.

This will restart your device. If you're still having problems, you may want to consider opening tickets.

messages.content: पण त्याला कोणतेही बटण नाही सोलर आणि एरियल आहे
messages.en: But it has no buttons solar and ariel
messages.standalone_question: How do I restart a device that has no buttons and is powered by solar and aerial?
messages.standalone_en: How do I restart a device that has no buttons and is powered by solar and aerial?
messages.content_transliterated: pan tyala konatehi batan nahi solar ani ariel aahe

messages.content:
जर तुमच्या डिव्हाइसवर कोणतेही बटण नसेल आणि ते सोलर आणि एरियलवर चालत असेल, तर तुम्ही खालील पायऱ्या अनुसरण करू शकता:

1. **सोलर पॅनेल तपासा**: सोलर पॅनेलवर थेट सूर्यप्रकाश आहे का ते तपासा. जर पॅनेलवर धूळ किंवा अडथळा असेल, तर ते स्वच्छ करा.
2. **पावर कनेक्शन**: डिव्हाइसच्या पावर कनेक्शनची तपासणी करा. कनेक्शन योग्य आहे का ते पाहा.
3. **डिव्हाइस रिस्टार्ट**: काही वेळा डिव्हाइस आपोआप रिस्टार्ट होते. तुम्ही थोडा वेळ थांबून पाहू शकता.

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याचा विचार करू शकता.
messages.en:
If there is no button on your device and it runs on solar and ariel, you can follow the following steps:

1. **Check solar panels**: Check if there is direct sunlight on the solar panels. If there is dust or obstruction on the panel, clean it.
2. **Power Connection**: Check the device's power connection. See if the connection is correct.
3. **Device Restart**: Sometimes the device is automatically restarted. You can wait and see for a while.

If you're still having problems, you may want to consider opening tickets.

messages.en: But what to do if the device sensor is damaged
messages.standalone_question: What should be done if the device sensor is faulty?
messages.standalone_en: What should be done if the device sensor is faulty?

faq:
Q: What should I do if the soil temperature sensor is not working?
A: Check the sensor connection, tighten it if loose, and restart the device to check updated data.

Q: What should I do if the rain gauge is not working?
A: Open the top cover of the rainfall sensor and clean it as suggested in the maintenance section.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows dry values?
A: Check if irrigation water is reaching the sensor, verify sensor connection, and ensure the sensor is not damaged.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor values fluctuate?
A: Ensure the sensor is installed properly in the soil, check for air bubbles, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

Q: How do I replace the sensors for Nero?
A: Disconnect the sensors by rotating them counterclockwise, unplug the connector, and replace them by following the steps in the manual.

messages.content:
जर डिव्हाइसचा सेन्सर खराब झाला असेल, तर तुम्हाला खालील पायऱ्या अनुसरण कराव्या लागतील:

1. **तपासणी करा**: सेन्सरची स्थिती तपासा. कनेक्शन ढिले असल्यास, ते घट्ट करा.
2. **फिजिकल चेक**: सेन्सर मातीच्या बाहेर आहे का ते तपासा. जर तो खराब झाला असेल, तर त्याला बदलण्याची आवश्यकता असू शकते.
3. **तांत्रिक सहाय्य**: जर तुम्हाला समस्या कायम राहिली, तर Fyllo च्या तांत्रिक सहाय्याशी संपर्क साधा. त्यांना तुमच्या डिव्हाइसची माहिती द्या आणि ते तुम्हाला योग्य मार्गदर्शन करतील.
4. **तिकीट उघडा**: तुम्ही तिकीट उघडून तांत्रिक सहाय्य मागवू शकता, जेणेकरून ते तुमच्या समस्येवर त्वरित उपाययोजना करू शकतील.

तुमच्या सेन्सरची स्थिती तपासणे आणि तांत्रिक सहाय्य घेणे हे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
If the device's sensor is damaged, you may have to follow the following steps:

1. **check**: Check the position of the sensor. If the connection is loose, tighten it.
2. **Physical check**: Check if the sensor is out of the soil. If it's damaged, it may need to be replaced.
3. **Technical Assistance**: If you continue to have a problem, contact Fyllo's technical assistance. Inform them about your device and they will guide you properly.
4. **Open the ticket**: You can open the ticket and ask for technical assistance, so that they can solve your problem quickly.

It is important to check the status of your sensor and seek technical assistance.

faq:
Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

Q: which are the insecticide and fungicide to be used for seed treatment
A: Insecticide:  Imidacloprid 600 FS – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds
Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

Q: How can I trust that Fyllo's fertigation schedule is accurate?
A: Fyllo's fertigation schedule is scientifically developed and validated based on crop requirements. It takes into account factors such as crop variety, growth stage, soil conditions, and available nutrient data from soil, leaf, or petiole tests when available.

Q: Why should I consider soil, leaf, or petiole testing?
A: Soil, leaf, and petiole testing are crucial for effective plant health management. These tests provide specific data about your crop's nutrient needs, allowing for more precise fertilizer application. This can lead to higher productivity with optimized input use, potentially reducing costs and environmental impact.

A: Insecticide:  Imidacloprid 600 FS – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds
Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content:
गर्भ धरणेसाठी (Fruit Set) तुम्हाला खालील स्प्रे वापरावे लागतील:

1. **Auxins** (जसे की NAA - नॅफ्थालिन एसीटिक आम्ल) - हे फळांच्या सेटिंगसाठी मदत करतात.
2. **Gibberellins** - हे फळांच्या वाढीसाठी आणि आकारासाठी उपयुक्त आहेत.
3. **Potassium Nitrate** - हे फळांच्या गुणवत्तेसाठी आणि उत्पादनासाठी उपयुक्त आहे.

तुम्ही या स्प्रेयांचा वापर करून गर्भ धरणे सुधारू शकता. स्प्रे करताना हवामान आणि पाण्याची स्थिती लक्षात घेणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
For pregnancy (Fruit Set) you will have to use the following sprays:

1. **Auxins** (such as NAA - Naphthalene Acetic Acid) - These help with the setting of fruits.
2. Gibberellins – These are useful for fruit growth and size.
3. Potassium Nitrate - It is useful for fruit quality and production.

You can improve pregnancy by using these sprays. It is important to take into account the weather and water conditions when spraying.

messages.content:
To raise a support ticket for Fyllo services, you can follow these steps:

1. **Open the Fyllo App**: Launch the Fyllo application on your device.
2. **Navigate to Support**: Look for the support or help section within the app.
3. **Create a Ticket**: Select the option to create a new support ticket. Provide details about your issue or request.
4. **Submit**: Once you've filled in the necessary information, submit the ticket.

If you need further assistance, you can also contact Fyllo customer support at (+91) 9380908040 or email them at contact@fyllo.in. If you have any agricultural-related questions, feel free to ask!
messages.en:
To raise a support ticket for Fyllo services, you can follow these steps:

1. **Open the Fyllo App**: Launch the Fyllo application on your device.
2. **Navigate to Support**: Look for the support or help section within the app.
3. **Create a Ticket**: Select the option to create a new support ticket. Provide details about your issue or request.
4. **Submit**: Once you've filled in the necessary information, submit the ticket.

If you need further assistance, you can also contact Fyllo customer support at (+91) 9380908040 or email them at contact@fyllo.in. If you have any agricultural-related questions, feel free to ask!

messages.content:
तुमच्या **Manikchaman Plot** मध्ये सध्या "Subcane" (सुबकन) स्टेज आहे, जी 6 व्या आठवड्यात आहे. 

### सध्याची फर्टिगेशन स्थिती:
- **सध्याची तारीख:** 13 जून 2025
- **फर्टिगेशनची आवश्यकता:** सध्या कोणतीही फर्टिगेशन आवश्यक नाही.

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल:
**स्टेज:** Topping (टॉपिंग)  
**आठवडा:** 1  
**शेड्यूलची तारीख:** 19 जून 2025

#### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
  - Manganese Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
- **सूचना:** फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म-खते 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावे, उदाहरणार्थ 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलोग्राम.

#### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - Magnesium Sulphate: 2.5 kg/acre
  - Phosphoric acid 80%: 3.5 kg/acre
- **सूचना:** फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल इतर खते लागू करण्यापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.

तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
Your **Manikchaman Plot** currently has the "Subcane" stage, which is in the 6th week. 

### Current Fertigation Status:
- **Current Date:** June 13, 2025
- **Fertigation Required:** No fertigation is currently required.

### Next Fertigation Schedule:
**Stage:** Topping  
**Week:** 1  
**Schedule Date:** 19th June 2025

#### By foliar method:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
  - Manganese Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
- **Notice:** Foliar spray should not contain more than 1% micro-food, e.g. 5 kg in 500 liters of water.

#### Fertigation Method:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  - Magnesium sulphate: 2.5 kg/acre
  - Phosphoric acid 80%: 3.5 kg/acre
- **Instructions:** Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before applying other accounts.

If you need more information, please let me know!

messages.content:
तुमच्या **Manikchaman Plot** मध्ये सध्या खालील स्थिती आहे:

### सध्याचे मातीचे आर्द्रता व तापमान:
- **मातीची आर्द्रता:** 
  - Sensor 1: 91% (सुखा)
  - Sensor 2: 89% (सुखा)
- **मातीचे तापमान:** 28.75°C

### पिकाची सध्याची अवस्था:
- **सध्याची अवस्था:** Subcane (सुबकन)
- **स्टेज सुरू होण्याची तारीख:** 8 मे 2025

### हवामानाची माहिती:
- तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये हवामान सेन्सर उपलब्ध नाहीत, त्यामुळे ऐतिहासिक हवामान डेटा उपलब्ध नाही.

### सध्या आर्द्रता वाढण्याचे कारण:
- सध्या तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये आर्द्रता कमी आहे, त्यामुळे आर्द्रता वाढत आहे. 
- पिकाची अवस्था (Subcane) आणि तापमान यामुळे आर्द्रता कमी होत आहे.

### शिफारस:
- तुम्ही मातीच्या सेन्सरच्या आजुबाजुच्या मातीची आर्द्रता तपासण्यासाठी थोडं खोदून पाहू शकता.
- जर तुम्हाला अजून काही शंका असल्यास, तुम्ही तिकीट तयार करू इच्छिता का? 

कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
Your **Manikchaman Plot** currently has the following status:

### Current soil moisture and temperature:
- *Soil moisture:** 
  - Sensor 1: 91% (Dry)
  - Sensor 2: 89% (Dry)
- **Soil temperature:** 28.75°C

### Current crop condition:
- **Current status:** Subcane (subcan)
- **Stage start date:** May 8, 2025

### Weather information:
- Weather sensors are not available in your plot, so historical weather data is not available.

### Reasons for the increase in humidity right now:
- Currently, the humidity in your plot is low, so the humidity is increasing. 
- Moisture is decreasing due to crop condition (subcane) and temperature.

### Recommendation:
- You can dig a little to check the soil moisture around the soil sensor.
- If you have any more doubts, would you like to make a ticket? 

Please tell me!

messages.standalone_question: What should I do to treat a garab (a type of illness)?
messages.standalone_en: What should I do to treat a garab (a type of illness)?

messages.content:
ನಿಮ್ಮ "ಅಬ್ದುಲ್ ಕನ್ನೂರ್ ಕೈರೋ" ಹಕ್ಕುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ "ಪತ್ರ ತಿನ್ನುವ ಕೀಟ" ವಿರುದ್ಧ ಹಾರ್ಮೋನ್ ಬಳಸಲು ಶಿಫಾರಸು ಮಾಡಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಈ ಕೆಳಗಿನವುಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು:

1. **ಸ್ಪಿನೋಸಡ್**: 100 ಮಿಲಿ
2. **ಎಮಾಮೆಕ್ಟಿನ್ ಬೆನ್ಜೋಯೇಟ್**: 90 ಗ್ರಾಂ

ನೀವು ಇಂದು (ಜೂನ್ 5) ಈ ಔಷಧಿಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸಬಹುದು. 400 ಲೀಟರ್ ನೀರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಈ ಔಷಧಿಗಳನ್ನು ಮಿಶ್ರಣ ಮಾಡಿ, ನಂತರ ಸಿಂಚನ ಮಾಡಿ.
messages.en:
It is recommended to use the hormone against the "letter-eating insect" in your "Abdul Kannur Cairo" claims. The following can be used:

1. **Spinosed**: 100 ml
2. **Emamectin Benzoate**: 90 g

You can use these medicines today (June 5). Mix these medicines in 400 litres of water, then spray.

1. **प्लॉट नं 1 थॉम्पसन**
   - स्थान: वडालीभोई, चांदवड, नाशिक, महाराष्ट्र
   - मातीचा प्रकार: फाइन सॅंडी लोम
   - क्षेत्र: 1.5 एकर
   - पिकाचे नाव: द्राक्षे
   - सक्रिय टप्पा: प्रारंभिक वेरायझन

2. **प्लॉट नं 3 एसएसएन**
   - स्थान: शिंदे, चांदवड, नाशिक, महाराष्ट्र
   - मातीचा प्रकार: सॅंडी लोम
   - क्षेत्र: 1.25 एकर
   - पिकाचे नाव: द्राक्षे

messages.content: How to use activity
messages.en: How to use activity
messages.standalone_question: How can I use the activity?
messages.standalone_en: How can I use the activity?

messages.content:
To use the activity feature in the Fyllo app, follow these steps:

1. **Open the Fyllo App**: Launch the app on your device.
2. **Navigate to Activities**: Look for the "Activities" section in the main menu.
3. **View Past Activities**: You can see a list of past activities related to your plots, including irrigation, fertilization, and pest control.
4. **Add New Activity**: If you want to log a new activity, look for an option to add or record an activity. Fill in the required details such as type of activity, date, and any notes.
5. **Save Changes**: Make sure to save any new entries or changes you make.

If you need specific guidance on a particular activity, feel free to ask!

messages.content: When I look for insights it not display all spray which I already write in activity section
messages.en: When I look for insights it not display all spray which I already write in activity section
messages.standalone_question: Why are not all the spray activities I recorded displaying when I look for insights?
messages.standalone_en: Why are not all the spray activities I recorded displaying when I look for insights?

messages.content:
The insights section may not display all the sprays you've recorded in the activity section due to a few reasons:

1. **Data Syncing**: There might be a delay in syncing the data between the activity section and insights. Give it some time and check again.

2. **Filters Applied**: Ensure that there are no filters applied in the insights section that might be limiting the displayed data.

3. **Data Limitations**: The insights section may only show a summary or specific types of activities rather than a complete list.

If the issue persists, consider reaching out to Fyllo support for further assistance.

messages.content: Suppose I sprayed nutribud,stronger,zn,ca
messages.en: Suppose I sprayed nutribud,stronger,zn,ca
messages.standalone_question: What specific sprays did you use, such as Nutribud, Stronger, Zn, and Ca?
messages.standalone_en: What specific sprays did you use, such as Nutribud, Stronger, Zn, and Ca?

messages.content:
If you've sprayed Nutribud, Stronger, Zinc (Zn), and Calcium (Ca), it's important to monitor the crop for any signs of improvement or stress. Here are a few steps to consider:

1. **Wait for Effectiveness**: Allow some time for the sprays to take effect. Nutrient absorption can take a few days to show visible results.

2. **Monitor Crop Health**: Keep an eye on the crop for any changes in color, growth, or signs of stress. 

3. **Check for Pests/Diseases**: Continue to monitor for any pest or disease activity, as these can affect the effectiveness of your sprays.

4. **Review Predictions**: If the app still shows high predictions for pests or diseases, it may be due to environmental conditions or other factors. Follow the app's recommendations for further action.

If you have any specific concerns or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: Why it not display in insights
messages.en: Why it not display in insights
messages.standalone_question: Why are the sprays not displayed in the insights section?
messages.standalone_en: Why are the sprays not displayed in the insights section?

messages.content:
If the sprays you recorded (Nutribud, Stronger, Zinc, and Calcium) are not displaying in the insights section, it could be due to the following reasons:

1. **Data Processing Delay**: There may be a delay in processing the recorded activities, which can affect their visibility in the insights section.

2. **Activity Type**: Ensure that the sprays you recorded are categorized correctly. Sometimes, specific types of activities may not be included in the insights summary.

3. **Time Frame**: The insights section may only display activities within a certain time frame. Check if the date of your sprays falls within the visible range.

4. **App Glitch**: There could be a temporary glitch in the app. Restarting the app or refreshing the insights section may help.

5. **User Permissions**: Ensure that you have the necessary permissions to view all recorded activities in the insights section.

If the issue continues, consider reaching out to Fyllo support for further assistance.

messages.content: कायेंरो दिवाईस बंद आहे चालू होत नाही
messages.en: Cairo Lights Off Not Turning Off
messages.standalone_question: Why is my device turned off and not turning on?
messages.standalone_en: Why is my device turned off and not turning on?

messages.content:
कायेंरो डिव्हाइस चालू करण्यासाठी, खालील चरणांचे पालन करा:

1. **स्विच तपासा**: डिव्हाइसच्या वरच्या कॅपच्या खाली असलेल्या स्विचवर क्लिक करा.
2. **बॅटरी तपासा**: बॅटरी कॅम्पार्टमेंट उघडा आणि 2xAA बॅटरी योग्यरित्या बसवलेले आहेत का ते तपासा.
3. **LED इंडिकेटर**: बॅटरी बसवल्यानंतर LED इंडिकेटर चालू होतो का ते पहा. तो प्रत्येक 16 सेकंदांनी चमकला पाहिजे.
4. **पुनः सुरू करा**: जर डिव्हाइस चालू होत नसेल, तर ते बंद करून पुन्हा चालू करण्याचा प्रयत्न करा.

जर यानंतरही डिव्हाइस चालू होत नसेल, तर तांत्रिक सहाय्य घेणे आवश्यक आहे.
messages.en:
To turn on the Cairo device, follow the steps below:

1. **Check the switch**: Click on the switch at the bottom of the top cap of the device.
2. **Check the battery**: Open the battery compartment and check that the 2xAA batteries are properly fitted.
3. **LED Indicator**: See if the LED indicator turns on after the battery is installed. It should shine every 16 seconds.
4. **Restart**: If the device doesn't turn on, turn it off and try to turn it on again.

If the device still does not turn on, technical assistance must be sought.

messages.content: Amchya keli che khupach nuksan jhale aahe tya vr kay upay aahe
messages.en: What's the solution to that VR that's really damaged our kelly?
messages.standalone_question: What measures can be taken to address the significant damage caused to my crops?
messages.standalone_en: What measures can be taken to address the significant damage caused to my crops?

messages.content:
Tumcha kharif kharacha nuksan zhalyavar, tumhala khup upay ghenyachi garaj aahe. Yaa sathi kahi upay ahet:

1. **Pest Control**: Pests cha nuksan kam karanyasathi pesticide vapra. Tumhi pest control schedule check karu shakta.

2. **Soil Health**: Zameenachi swasthya sudharanyasathi organic fertilizers va compost vapra.

3. **Irrigation**: Pani puravta sathi sahi irrigation techniques vapra. Soil moisture check karun, jar zameen khushk asel tar pani dya.

4. **Crop Rotation**: Agle varshat vegvege crop ghenyacha vichar kara, jya mule zameenachi swasthya sudharu shakta.

5. **Disease Management**: Tumhi crop diseases cha vishay check karu shakta, ani tya sathi upay ghenyacha prayatna kara.

Tumhala kahi specific madat pahije ka?
messages.en:
When your kharif is truly damaged, you need to take a lot of measures. Here are some solutions:

1. **Pest Control**: Use pestides to work paste damage. You can check the pest control schedule.

2. **Soil Health**: Use organic fertilizers or compost to improve Zamina's health.

3. **Irrigation**: Use the right irrigation technique to supply water. Check the soil moisturizer and water if the ground is dry.

4. **Crop Rotation**: Consider getting a fast crop in the next year, which can improve Zamina's health.

5. **Disease Management**: You can check out crop disease topics, and try to find a solution.

Do you need any specific help?

messages.content: पाणी डेटा दाखवत नाही
messages.en: Water does not show data
messages.standalone_question: The standalone question is: "Why is the water data not showing?"
messages.standalone_en: The standalone question is: "Why is the water data not showing?"

messages.content:
कृपया सांगा, तुम्ही शेवटचा पाणी दिला कधी? पाण्याचा डेटा दाखवण्यासाठी साधारणतः 12 तास लागतात. जर तुम्ही पाणी दिल्यानंतर 12 तासांनंतरही डेटा बदलला नसेल, तर काही कारणे असू शकतात:

1. पाण्याचा प्रवाह योग्यरित्या सेन्सरपर्यंत पोहोचत नाही. हे ड्रिप ब्लॉक झाल्यामुळे, जमिनीच्या उतारामुळे किंवा सेन्सरच्या अंतरावर असलेल्या ड्रिपर आउटलेट्समुळे होऊ शकते.
2. सेन्सर जुना आहे, म्हणजे दोन वर्षांपेक्षा जास्त जुना असल्यास, सेन्सर खराब होऊ शकतो.

कृपया तपासा की ड्रिप व्यवस्थित आहे का आणि सेन्सरच्या श्रेणीत ड्रिपर आहे का. तुम्हाला आणखी मदतीची आवश्यकता असल्यास, मला सांगा.
messages.en:
Please tell me, when was the last time you gave water? It usually takes 12 hours to show water data. If the data hasn't changed until 12 hours after you've watered it, there may be a few reasons:

1. The flow of water does not reach the sensor properly. This can be caused by drip blocking, slope of the ground, or dripper outlets located within the distance of the sensor.
2. If the sensor is old, i.e. more than two years old, the sensor may malfunction.

Please check if the drip is in order and if the dripper is in the range of sensors. If you need more help, let me know.

messages.content: Data is not receiving
messages.en: Data is not receiving
messages.standalone_question: Why is the data not being received?
messages.standalone_en: Why is the data not being received?

messages.content:
It seems your device may not be sending data properly. This could be due to connectivity issues or other technical problems. Here are a few steps you can take:

1. **Check Device Connection**: Ensure that the device is properly connected to the app.
2. **Network Connectivity**: Verify that there is a stable internet connection.
3. **Battery Status**: Check the battery level of the device.
4. **Restart the Device**: Sometimes, simply restarting the device can resolve the issue.

If the problem persists after these checks, please consider raising a support ticket in the Fyllo App for further assistance. Would you like the contact details of our support team?
messages.en:

messages.standalone_question: How do I check the device connection?
messages.standalone_en: How do I check the device connection?

messages.content:
डिव्हाइस कनेक्शन तपासण्यासाठी खालील पायऱ्या अनुसरा:

1. **फायलो अॅप उघडा**: तुमच्या मोबाइलवर फायलो अॅप उघडा.

2. **डिव्हाइस सेटिंग्ज**: अॅपच्या सेटिंग्ज किंवा डिव्हाइस सेक्शनमध्ये जा.

3. **कनेक्शन स्थिती**: तिथे तुम्हाला तुमच्या डिव्हाइसची कनेक्शन स्थिती दिसेल. "कनेक्टेड" किंवा "ऑफलाइन" अशी माहिती मिळेल.

4. **नेटवर्क तपासा**: तुमच्या मोबाइलच्या इंटरनेट कनेक्शनची स्थिती तपासा. Wi-Fi किंवा मोबाइल डेटा चालू आहे का ते पाहा.

5. **डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा**: जर कनेक्शन समस्या असेल, तर डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा आणि पुन्हा कनेक्ट करण्याचा प्रयत्न करा.

6. **सपोर्ट टीमशी संपर्क**: जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर फायलो सपोर्ट टीमशी संपर्क साधा.

तुम्हाला आणखी काही मदतीची आवश्यकता आहे का?
messages.en:
Follow the following steps to check the device connection:

1. **Open the Filo app**: Open the Filo app on your mobile.

2. **Device Settings**: Go to the app's settings or device section.

3. **Connection Status**: There you will see the connection status of your device. Information such as "connected" or "offline" will be available.

4. **Check the network**: Check the status of your mobile's internet connection. See if Wi-Fi or mobile data is running.

5. **Restart the device**: If there is a connection problem, restart the device and try to reconnect.

6. **Contact the support team**: If the problem persists, contact the Filo support team.

Do you need any more help?

messages.content:
0 kPa cha sensor reading mhanje soil fully wet aahe. Tumhala 0 kPa paryant nahi yeil, pan 0 to 5 kPa cha reading hi wet conditions sathi yogya aahe. Tumhi irrigation zhalyanantar 12 ghante wait kara, nantar sensor cha reading check kara. 

Tumhala kahi dusre prashna aahe ka?
messages.en:
The sensor reading of 0 kPa is soil full weight. You won't get up to 0 kpa, but a reading of 0 to 5 kpa is suitable for weight conditions. Wait 12 hours after you've done the irrigation, then check the sensor reading. 

Do you have any other questions?

messages.content:
आपल्या डिवाईसच्या डेटा प्राप्त न होण्याची काही कारणे असू शकतात. कृपया खालील गोष्टी तपासा:

1. **डिवाईस कनेक्शन**: सुनिश्चित करा की डिवाईस अॅपशी जोडलेले आहे.
2. **नेटवर्क कनेक्टिव्हिटी**: इंटरनेट कनेक्शन तपासा.
3. **बॅटरी स्थिती**: बॅटरीची स्थिती तपासा, ती कमी असल्यास चार्ज करा.
4. **डिवाईस रीस्टार्ट करा**: डिवाईस रीस्टार्ट करून पाहा.

जर या सर्व गोष्टी तपासल्यानंतरही समस्या कायम राहिली, तर कृपया Fyllo सपोर्ट टीमशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
There may be some reasons why your device's data may not be received. Please check the following:

1. **Device Connection**: Make sure the device is connected to the app.
2. **Network connectivity**: Check internet connection.
3. **Battery status**: Check the battery position, charge if it's low.
4. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart.

If the problem persists even after checking all these things, please contact the Fyllo support team.

messages.content:
तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये सध्या "कैन थिनिंग" (Cane thinning) चा सक्रिय टप्पा आहे, जो 4 मे 2025 पासून सुरू झाला आहे. 

सध्या मातीतील आर्द्रता 100% आणि 98% आहे, जे अत्यंत उच्च आहे. मागील आठवड्यातील मातीतील आर्द्रता खालीलप्रमाणे होती:
- 1 मे: 93%
- 2 मे: 91%
- 3 मे: 90%
- 4 मे: 86%
- 5 मे: 79%
- 6 मे: 73%

आर्द्रता हळूहळू कमी होत आहे, परंतु सध्या ती उच्च आहे. याचा अर्थ तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये पाण्याची गरज नाही. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये तापमान किंवा वाऱ्याच्या वेगाबद्दल कोणतीही माहिती उपलब्ध नाही, त्यामुळे तुम्हाला शारीरिकरित्या मातीची आर्द्रता तपासण्याची शिफारस करतो. जर तुम्हाला वाटत असेल की सेन्सर चुकीची माहिती देत आहे, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडू इच्छिता का?
messages.en:
Your plot currently has an active phase of "cane thinning", which began on May 4, 2025. 

Currently, soil moisture is between 100% and 98%, which is extremely high. Last week's soil moisture was as follows:
- May 1: 93%
- May 2: 91%
- May 3: 90%
- May 4: 86%
- May 5: 79%
- May 6: 73%

Humidity is gradually decreasing, but right now it's high. This means your plot doesn't need water. 

There is no information available about the temperature or wind speed in your plot, so I recommend that you physically check the soil moisture. If you think the sensor is giving incorrect information, do you want to open the ticket?

messages.content:
Moisture sensor kPa value drop hoti ahe, tar kahi karan asu shaktat. Tumhi irrigation kelela aahe ka? Kahi vel lagto soil la saturate honyasaathi. Tumhi irrigation kelela asel, tar 12 ghante thambava. 

Aata, tumhi sensor chya aas-paas moisture check karu shakta ka? Jar sensor dry dakhavto aani aas-paas soil wet asel, tar sensor worn out asu shakta. Tumhala support team kade ticket raise karaycha ahe ka?
messages.en:
The moisture sensor is dropping kpa value, while there may be some reason. Have you done irrigation? It takes some time for the soil to settle down. If you're irrigated, wait 12 hours. 

Now, can you check the moisturizer around the sensor? If the sensor shows the drive and there is a soil weight around, the sensor can be warned out. Do you want to buy a ticket to the support team?

faq:
Q: How does the device predict diseases and pests?
A: It captures data from different parameters using sensors and analyzes it using various agronomical algorithms, including different models for all diseases and pests.
   Each disease and pest has a specific etymology, which is the suitable environment for its incidence.

messages.en: My farm has a file sensor unit installed on May 14, 2025 but it hasn't been calibrated yet so what needs to be done to ensure proper readings are not available.
messages.standalone_question: What should I do to calibrate the sensor unit installed in my field on April 14, 2025, as it is not providing accurate readings?
messages.standalone_en: What should I do to calibrate the sensor unit installed in my field on April 14, 2025, as it is not providing accurate readings?

faq:
Q: How to calibrate soil moisture sensors ?
A:  The way to calibrate sensors is by putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. A drop after watering or irrigation and continuous dry upto 200 kpa means that the sensor is calibrated.

Q: What should I do if the soil temperature sensor is not working?
A: Check the sensor connection, tighten it if loose, and restart the device to check updated data.

Q: My  sensor is showing 0 Kpa for long.
A: 0-5 kPa means wet soil. It can be due to following :
If the device is recently installed, there can be moisture  around the sensor because the sensor is dipped in the water before installing. If this is the case, ask them to do atleast 3 irrigations as per their previous schedule without sensors and sensors would b set by then.
If the crop stage is very early or pruing is done recently, the water takeup by plants is negligible in this period because of very less transpiration. If this is the case, ask them to wait till irrigation Kpa in the present stage.
Sometimes, the water can remain accumulated around the sensor due to local landscaping or slope in the land around sensor. In this case, please check the around the sensor. It will have to be reinstalled properly. Chatbot should ask the user if he wants to create an issue ticket for the same

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor values fluctuate?
A: Ensure the sensor is installed properly in the soil, check for air bubbles, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

Q: How do I set up sensors for Kairo?
A: Place soil moisture sensors in water for about 30 minutes before starting the device.

messages.content_transliterated: mazya shetamadhye 14 4 2025 ya divashi phailache sensor unit basavalele aahe parantu adyap tyache calibration jhalele nahi tyamule yogy reading milat nahit tyasathi kay karayala pahije daksh

messages.content:
जर तुमच्या शेतामध्ये 14 एप्रिल 2025 रोजी फाईलचे सेंसर युनिट बसवले असेल आणि त्याचे कॅलिब्रेशन झालेले नसेल, तर तुम्हाला खालील गोष्टी करायला पाहिजेत:

1. **पाण्यात बुडवा:** सेंसरला पाण्यात 30 मिनिटे बुडवून ठेवा. यामुळे त्याला योग्य रीडिंग मिळवण्यासाठी आवश्यक असलेली ओलावा मिळेल.

2. **पाण्याची सिंचन करा:** तुमच्या शेतात 3 वेळा सिंचन करा, जसे तुम्ही आधी केले होते. यामुळे सेंसर योग्य रितीने सेट होईल.

3. **स्थापना तपासा:** सेंसरची स्थापना योग्य आहे का ते तपासा. जर आसपासच्या मातीमध्ये पाणी साचले असेल, तर ते सेंसरच्या रीडिंगवर परिणाम करू शकते.

4. **फ्लक्चुएशन तपासा:** जर रीडिंगमध्ये अजूनही चढ-उतार होत असेल, तर तुम्हाला फाईलोच्या प्रतिनिधीशी संपर्क साधावा लागेल.

जर तुम्हाला याबद्दल अधिक मदतीची आवश्यकता असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट तयार करण्याची इच्छा आहे का?
messages.en:
If your field is fitted with a file sensor unit on April 14, 2025, and it has not been calibrated, you should do the following:

1. **Dip in water:** Dip the sensor in water for 30 minutes. This will give him the moisture he needs to get the right reading.

2. **Irrigate the water:** Irrigate your field 3 times, as you did before. This will set the sensor properly.

3. **Check installation:** Check if the installation of the sensor is correct. If water has accumulated in the surrounding soil, it can affect the sensor's readings.

4. **Check the fluctuation:** If the readings are still fluctuating, you may need to contact the file's representative.

If you need more help with this, would you like to prepare a ticket?

messages.content: तिकीट म्हणजे काय
messages.en: What is a ticket?
messages.standalone_question: What is a ticket?
messages.standalone_en: What is a ticket?

messages.content:
तिकीट म्हणजे एक प्रकारची विनंती किंवा समस्या नोंदवण्याची प्रक्रिया, ज्याद्वारे तुम्ही तुमच्या समस्येची माहिती संबंधित तंत्रज्ञ किंवा सेवा पुरवठादाराला देऊ शकता. यामध्ये तुम्ही तुमच्या समस्येचे तपशील, आवश्यक माहिती आणि तुमच्या अपेक्षा सामील करू शकता. 

फाईलोच्या तंत्रज्ञांना तिकीट तयार करून तुम्ही तुमच्या सेंसरच्या कॅलिब्रेशनसाठी मदतीची विनंती करू शकता. हे तंत्रज्ञांना तुमच्या समस्येवर लक्ष केंद्रित करण्यास मदत करते आणि ते तुम्हाला योग्य मार्गदर्शन देऊ शकतात. 

तुम्हाला तिकीट तयार करायचे आहे का?
messages.en:
A ticket is a type of request or problem reporting process, by which you can report your problem to the relevant technician or service provider. You can include details of your problem, necessary information, and your expectations. 

You can request help with calibration of your sensor by preparing a ticket to fileo's technicians. It helps technicians focus on your problem and they can give you the right guidance. 

Do you want to make a ticket?

messages.content:
जर तुम्ही फाईलोच्या प्रतिनिधीला तीन-चार वेळा संपर्क केला तरीही तुमच्या समस्येचे निरसन होत नसेल, तर तुम्हाला खालील गोष्टी करायला पाहिजेत:

1. **तिकीट तयार करा:** तुमच्या समस्येची अधिकृत नोंद करण्यासाठी फाईलोच्या अॅपमध्ये तिकीट तयार करा. यामध्ये तुमच्या समस्येचे तपशील, तुम्ही केलेले संपर्क, आणि अपेक्षित निरसन यांचा समावेश करा.

2. **संपर्क साधा:** तुम्ही फाईलोच्या ग्राहक समर्थनाशी थेट संपर्क साधू शकता. त्यांना तुमच्या समस्येची माहिती द्या आणि तिकीट क्रमांक सांगा.

3. **सामाजिक माध्यमे:** फाईलोच्या सामाजिक माध्यमांवर तुमच्या समस्येची माहिती शेअर करा. यामुळे तुमच्या समस्येवर जलद लक्ष दिले जाऊ शकते.

4. **प्रतिनिधींचा मागोवा:** तुम्ही तुमच्या संपर्क केलेल्या प्रतिनिधींचा मागोवा घ्या आणि त्यांना तुमच्या समस्येची स्थिती विचारू शकता.

तुमच्या समस्येचे निरसन लवकरात लवकर होईल अशी आशा आहे.
messages.en:
If your problem is not resolved even if you contact the file's representative three or four times, you should do the following:

1. **Create a ticket:** Create a ticket in Filo's app to officially report your problem. This includes details of your problem, the contacts you have made, and the expected fixation.

2. **Contact:** You can contact Filo's customer support directly. Inform them about your problem and tell them the ticket number.

3. **Social media:** Share information about your problem on file's social media. This can help your problem be addressed faster.

4. **Track delegates:** Track your contacted representatives and ask them the status of your problem.

I hope your problem will be resolved as soon as possible.

4. **Installation**: Follow the installation instructions provided with the new solar panel to ensure it is mounted correctly.

5. **Regular Maintenance**: After replacing, ensure regular maintenance to prevent future damage.

If you need assistance with contacting support or finding a replacement, let me know!
